songs.title: MWAKA B.docx 2020
songs.lyrics:
ZABURI YA KUITIKIZANA 
Zaburi 105:1b-2,3-,5-6,8-9(k.7a,8a)	


K.
 Bwana, Mungu wetu, anakumbuka agano lake milele.

Msifuni Bwana, liiteni jina lake; wajulisheni mataifa masdatendo yake!
Mwimbieni kwa ala za nyuzi; elezeni matendo yake yote ya ajabu! K.


Jisifuni kwa jina lake takatifu; ufurahi moyo wa wenye kumtafuta Bwana!
Mtegemceni Bwana na enzi yake; utafuteni uso wake siku zote. K.



Yakumbukeni matendo yake ya ajabu aliyoyafanya, ishara zake na maagizo yake, enyi wazao wa Abrahamu, mtumishi wake, enyi wana wa Yakobo, wateule wake! K




Anakumbuka agano lake milele, neno aliloamuru kwa vizazi elfu, agano alilofanya na Abrahamu, na kiapo alichomwapia Isaka. K.



SOMO LA PILL  
Waebrania 11:8,11-12,17-19
"Imani ya Abrahamu. Sara na Isaka. "


Ndugu zangu: Kwa njia ya imani Abrahamu alitii alipoitwa ahamie nchi ambayo angepewa kuwa mali yake. Alihama bila kujua anakokwenda. 

Kwa njia ya imani alipewa nguvu ya kuzaa, licha ya kuwa alishazidi umri, (na Sara mwenyewe alikuwa tasa) kwani alijua kwamba yeye aliycfanya ahadi alikuwa mwaminifu. 



Hivyo mtu mmea katika hali ya kufifia akawa baba wa wengi, idadi yao kama nyota za mbinguni, na kama chembe za mchanga wa pwani zisizohesabika.





Kwa njia ya imani Abrahamu alipojaribiwa alirntoa Isaka sadaka, alikuwa tayari kumtoa mwanawe wa peke, 


ingawa alikuwa amezipokea ahadi na kuambiwa, "Katika Isaka utapata wazao." Alijua Mungu ana uwezo wa kufufua wafu. Kwa hiyo alimpata tena Isaka kama kiashirio.
Neno la Bwana



SALA KABLA YA KOMUNIO


Ee Yesu, mkate wa mbingu, ninakututamani.
Uje kwangu uliye uzima na heri yangu.


Uje, chakula cha roho yangu, unitie imara.
Uje, Mwanakondoo wa Mungu, uondoe dhambi zangu.


Uje, mganga wa roho, uponye udhaifu wangu.
Uje, ee Yesu, uungune nami, Amina.


SALA BAADA YA KOMUNYO


KUABUDU


Ee Yesu wangu, nakuabudu moyoni mwangu ulimo, nakuungama ndiwe Bwana wangu na Mungu wangu, Mungu-Mtu na Mkombozi wangu.


Sifai mimi kukuabudu vema unavyostahili; nawaomba watakatifu na malaika wa mbinguni wakuabudu pamoja nami.


MAPENDO


Ee Yesu uliyejaa wema na mapendo, umekuja m oyoni mwangu.


Wewe Mwumba Mwenyezi umefika kwa kiumbe chako; wewe Mkombozi umefika kwa mtu mkosefu.


Umekuja kunipa hakika ya mapendo yako.  Nakupenda, Mungu wangu. Unitie mapendo, nikupende kama unavyostahili kupendwa.


SHUKRANI


Ee Yesu, nakushukuru sana kwani umenitendea makuu: umenilisha mwili wako mtukufu, umeungana nami kabisa.


Umeniongezea uzima rohoni mwangu; umenipa nguvu mpya ya kutenda mema; umenisaidia katika udhaifu wangu; nitakurudishia nini?


Umenipa moyo wako, nami nakupa moyo wangu na akili yangu, kazi zangu na mateso yangu, nafsi yangu yote.


Najitolea kuwa kitu chako kabisa.  Yesu wangu mimi ni mali yako katika maisha na saa ya kufa.


MAOMBI


Ee Yesu, mkarimu kwa wote wanaokuomba.  Uitunze neema yako, niendeleaa kukupenda.


Umetakasa mwili na roho.


Nakuomba ulimi wangu uliokugusa usiseme maneno mabaya: moyo wangu uliokupokea usitamani maovu; mwili wangu unamokaa ukutumikie kwa matendo ya haki.


Unilinde katika hatari na vishawishi;  unisaidie kuvumilia taabu na masumbuko; unizidishie upendo wako nipate kufanana nawe zaidi.


MAOMBEZI
Ee Yesu, mchungaji mwema, nakuomba uwatendee mema waliounganika nawe.


Ulinde kanisa lako lote, uwafanyizie vema jamaa zangu, rafiki na wafadhili, wakubwa na wanyonge.


Uwafariji maskini na wazee, uwainue wagonjwa na wanaozimia, uwapokee kwako roho za marehemu.


Ubariki nyumba zetu, wanyama wetu na mashamba yetu.  Utujalie mahitaji ya maisha, afya njema na riziki za kutosha.


Uwarudishie ndugu wote waliojitenga nawe waungane na kundi lako moja.  Na amani yako ikae na watu wote. Amina.


SALA YA MTAKATIFU INYASIO


Roho ya Kristu initakase.
Mwili wa Kristu uniokoe.


Damu ya Kristu inichangamshe.
Maji ya ubavu wa Kristu yanioshe.


Mateso ya Kristu nguvu yanizidishie.
Ee Yesu mwema, unisikilize.


Katika madonda yako unifiche.
Usikubali nitengane nawe.


Na adui mwovu unikinge
Saa kufa kwangu unite.


Uniamuru kwako nije.
Na watakatifu wako nikutukuze.


Milele na milele.  Amina.


KUIOMBEA PAROKIA YETU.


K.Ee Bwana Yesu Kristu, ndiwe kichwa cha kanisa lako hapa kwetu. Kwa matumaini tunakuomba kwa ajili ya waamini wote wa parokia yetu.
	


Uwalinde wote walio nyumbani na ugenini.
W.	Usikilize maombi yetu (baada ya kila aya)


K.	Uwaongoze wenye furaha na wenye huzuni
Uwavute watu wema na wenye bidii.


Uwaimarishe wote walio dhaifu.
Uwasimamishe walioanguka.


Uwahimize wavivu na wazembe.
uwaonye walio katika hatari ya kupotea.


Uwafariji wazima na wafu.


Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Kama mwanzo na sasa na siku zote na milele milele Amina x 3


Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.  Amina.


Nasadiki  kwa mungu baba mwenyezi, mwumba mbingu na dunia .Na kwa yesu kristu mwanaye wa pekee, Bwana wetu , aliyetungwa kwa roho mtakatifu akazaliwa na bikira maria 
,akateswa kwa mamlaka ya ponsyo pilato ,akasulubiwa ,akafa, akazikwa, akashukia , kuzimu,  siku ya  tatu akafufuka katika wafu akapaa mbinguni amekaa  kuume kwa mungu baba mwenyezi  

toka huko atakuja kuwahukumu wazima na wafu nasadiki kwa roho mtakatifu kanisa takatifu katoliki ushirika wa watakatifu maondoleo ya dhambi ufufuko wa miili na uzima wa milele.
AMINA

SHANGILIO LA INJILI
	Waebrania 1:1-2
Aleluya.	Aleluya.
 Mara nyingi na kwa namna nyingi
Mungu alisema na mababu zetu kwa njia ya manabii.
Siku hizi za mwisho amesema na sisi kwa njia ya Mwana.
Aleluya.



INJILI
LUKA 2:22-40
"Mtoto alikua. akawa amejaa hekima " 

Zilipotimia siku zao za kutakasika zilizoamriwa katika Sheria ya Musa, wazazi wa Yesu walimpeleka Yerusalemu ili wamtoe kwa Bwana, kama ilivyoandikwa katika sheria ya Bwana, 

"Kila mtoto wa kiume aliye mzaliwa wa kwanza awekwe wakfu kwa Bwana," na watoe sadaka kama ilivyotajwa katika sheria ya Bwana. i.

"hua wawili au makinda mawili ya njiwa."
Huko Yerusalemu palikuwa na mtu jina lake Simeon

 Alikuwa mtu mwadilifu, mcha Mungu, naye alitazamia faraja ya Israeli na Roho Mtakatifu alikuwa naye. Alikuwa amejulishwa na 


Roho Mtakatifu ya kwamba hataona mauti kabla ya kumwona Kristo wa Bwana.
Akaongozwa na Roho aende hckaluni; wakati wazazi walipomleta mtoto Yesu humo,


 ili wamfanyie kama ilivyokuwa desturi ya sheria, akampokea mtoto mikononi mwake, akamtukuza Mungu akiscma:
"Sasa, Ee Bwana, waweza kumruhusu mtumishi wako aendc kwa amani kama ulivyonena, maana macho yangu yameuona wokovu wako, 


ulioandaa mbele ya watu wote, mwanga wa kuwaangazia Mataifa, na utukufu wa taifa lako Israeli."
Baba na mama yakc walishangazwa na mancno yaliyosemwa juu yake: Simeonİ akawabariki, na akamwambia Maria mama yake,



 „Tazama, huyu amewekwa kwa kuanguka na kuinuka wcngi katika Israeli. tena kama ishara itakayokataliwa. Na upanga utakupenya moyoni ili mawazo ya mioyo mingi yafunuliwe."


palikuwa na nabii mwanamkc, ndiye Anna, binti Fanueli wa kabila la Asheri. Alikuwa mzec sana. Kwanza, baada ya uanawali wake, aliishi na mume wake miaka saba, 

kisha akawa mjane mpaka kufikia umri wa miaka themanini na minne, alishinda daima hckaIunİ akimtumikia Mungu kwa kufunga na kusali usiku na mchana.

Naye akafika saa ilc ile, akamtukuza Mungu na akawasimulia habarİ zake wote walioutazamia ukombozi wa Yerusalemu. Basi, walipotimiza yote yaliyoamriwa katika sheria ya Bwana, 




walirudi Galilaya, mjini kwao Nazareti.
Mtoto akakua, akaongezeka nguvu, akawa amejaa hekima; na neema ya Mungu ilikuwa juu yake.
Injili ya Bwana.




SOMO LA KWANZA
	Mwanzo 15:1-6;21:1-3
" Mmoja atakayezaliwa kwa damu yako ndiye atakayekuwa mrithi wako. "

Wakati ule: Neno la Bwana Iilimfikia Abrarnu katika maono. Iikanena: "Usiogope, Abramu! Mimi ni ngao yako: thawabu yako itakuwa kubwa sana!" Abramu akajibu, 


"Ee Bwana, utanipa nini? Mimi nitaenda zangu pasipo mtoto. na atakayesimamia nyumba yangu ndiye yule Eliezeri, wa Damasko."
Abramu akaendelea kusema, Tazama, hukunipa uzao, na mmojawapo wa hawa watu wa nyumbani mwangu atanirithi."


Hapo neno la Bwana likamjia, likisema: "Huyu hatakuwa mrithi wako. bali mmoja atakayezaliwa kwa damu yako.
Akamleta nje, akasema:
"Utazame mbinguni, uhesabu nyota, kama waweza kuzihesabu."
Akamwambia: 


"Ndivyo upao wako utakavyokuwa." Abramu akamwamini Bwana. naye Bwana akamhesabia jambo hilo kuwa haki. Bwana akamjia Sara kama alivyosema, akamfanyia kama alivyoahidi.



 Sara akapata mimba, wakati alioambiwa na Mungu, akamzalia Abrahamu mwana katika uzee wake.
Naye mwana huyo wa Sara. aliyezaliwa kwake, Abrahamu akamwita jina lake Isaka.
Neno la Bwana.

Huo ndio wokovu wenu shikilieni msiachie

Sote twaamini, ni mwili wake, pia twaamini ni damu yake,

(Ni chakula cha roho chenye uzima)

Wewe tu.

Hekimayo niongoze,
Tumaini wewe tu.


verse 3

Wema wako milele;
'Nifutie dhambi zangu,
Tumaini wewe tu.


verse 4

Ewe Mungu amini;
'Nitubishe, mwenye
Dhambi, tumaini wewe tu.


verse 5

'niokoe dhikini;
'Nisamehe dhambi zangu,
Tumaini wewe tu.


verse 6
 Njia zako zote, Bwana, ni
Fadhili na kweli;
'Niongoze, mtoto wako,
Tumaini wewe tu.

songs.title: NANI HAWA (2024)
songs.lyrics:
NANI HAWA

enyi wateule wangu mimi leo nawaita wote njooni kwangu niwashibishe kwa chakula
cha mbiguni) X2

mwili tunywe damu  

(taza - meni - mezani 
ni tayari twende tukale kwa fu - raha - Bwana yesu anatuita. Enyi wateule wangu mimi leo nawaita wote njooni kwangu
niwashibishe kwa chakula cha mbiguni)X2

tukiwa tajiri au masikini bali tuwe na moyo safi.

kutoa mwili kutoa damu yake kuzishibisha Roho zetu



4. Ni fundisho kutoka kwake- Bwana tuonye-she ukarimu
kwa ndugu rafiki au majirani daima maishani mwetu

songs.title: natamani kujongea altare yako
songs.lyrics:
Natamani Kujongea Altare Yako

natamani kujongea kwenye altare yako, ili nami nishiriki
kwenye karamu ya bwana yesu(X2 )

niuone uzuri wa bwana uliomo
katika fumbo takatifu la ekaristi mwili na damu ya yesu nimpokee 
bwana yesu kristu nakuisha pamoja naye siku zote akaye ndani yangu
nami ndani yake.


1.bwana naomba unijalie moyo wa uchaji, nitubu dhambi nami ninjongee 
meza yako ninakuomba unijalie usafi wa moyo nikupokee nikiwa katika halinjema.


2.karamu yako ni takatifu tena ya amani iliyojaa upendo na uzima milele na wale
watakaoshiriki kwenye meza yako imewapasa kujua vema siri yako.



3.uwajalie huruma yako na mapendo yako, uwatie nguvu wote wasio kupokea kwa
nguvu yako uwainue walioanguka waondoe vizuizi vinavyo waangusha.


4.uwaalike wanao wote kwenye meza yako washiriki karamu ya uzima wa milele
wafurahie amani yako na mapendo yako, yaliyo fichwa kwenye fumbo hili takatifu.

songs.title: Ndipo niliposema, tazama
songs.lyrics:
Ndipo niliposema, tazama nimekuja Bwana nimekuja, tazama nimekuja kuyafanya mapenzi yako x 2

1. Nalimngoja Bwana kwa saburi, akaniinamia akakisikia kilio changu, akatia wimbo mpya kinywani mwangu ndiye sifa zake Mungu wetu.

2. Dhabihu na matoleo hukupendezwa nayo, masikio yangu umeyazibua, kafara na sadaka za dhambi hukuzitaka, ndipo niliposema tazama nimekuja.

3. Katika gombo la chuo nimeandikiwa, kuyafanya mapenzi yako, mapenzi yako, ee Mungu wangu ndiyo furaha furaha yangu, naam sheria yako i moyoni mwangu.

4. Nimehubiri habari za haki katika kusanyiko kusanyiko kubwa, sikuizuia midogo yangu, ee Bwana, ee Bwana, ee Bwana unajua.

songs.title: NICENE CREED(long)
songs.lyrics:
NICENE CREED

I believe in one God,
the Father almighty,
maker of heaven and earth,
of all things visible and invisible.

I believe in one Lord Jesus Christ,
the Only Begotten Son of God,
born of the Father before all ages.

God from God, Light from Light,
true God from true God,
begotten, not made, consubstantial with the Father;
through him all things were made.

For us men and for our salvation
he came down from heaven,
and by the holy spirit was incarnate of the Virgin Mary,
and became man.

For our sake he was crucified under Pontius Pilate,
he suffered death and was buried,
and rose again on the third day
in accordance with the Scriptures.

He ascended into heaven
and is seated at the right hand of the Father.
He will come again in glory
to judge the living and the dead
and his kingdom will have no end.

I believe in the Holy Spirit, the Lord, the giver of Life,
who proceeds from the Father and the Son,
who with the Father and the Son is adored and glorified,
who has spoken through the Prophets.

I believe in one, holy, catholic and apostolic Church.
I confess one Baptism for the forgiveness of sins
and I look forward to the resurrection of the dead
and the life of the world to come.
 Amen

songs.lyrics:
NIKUPE NINI MUNGU WANGU (BASIL)


Nikupe nini Mungu wangu, nikupe nini we mwokozi, nikupe nini Bwana wangu cha kukupendeza. x2


1. Kila nitakachoshika mbona bado ni kidogo,mema unayoyatenda kwangu mimi naogopa, 


Ninakuomba mwokozi,nifanyie msamaha, na unipokee.Mema   unayoyatenda, nitafanya nini mimi nikurudishie.


2. Nakutolea mkate toka mmea wa ngano,Nakutolea divai ni tunda la mzabihu,


3. Mchana hata usiku wewe wanisimamia,Na nikiwa safarini waniepusha ajali,

3. Twatoa mkate, twatoa divai, upokee Bwana, fedha nazo Bwana tunakutolea upokee Bwana.

Ninakuomba Mwokozi, nifanyie msamaha na unipokee
Mema unayoyatenda, nitafanya nini mimi, nikurudishie.

Nakutolea divai ni tunda la mzabibu
Ninakuomba Mwokozi, nifanyie msamaha na unipokee
Mema unayoyatenda, nitafanya nini mimi, nikurudishie.


Chorus
Nikupe nini Mungu wangu, nikupe nini we Mwokozi Nikupe nini Bwana wangu cha kukupendeza?

Na nikiwa safarini waniepusha ajali
Ninakuomba Mwokozi, nifanyie msamaha na unipokee
Mema unayoyatenda, nitafanya nini mimi, nikurudishie.


Chorus
Nikupe nini Mungu wangu, nikupe nini we Mwokozi Nikupe nini Bwana wangu cha kukupendeza?

Nikiwa kwenya majonzi Bwana unanifariji
Ninakuomba Mwokozi, nifanyie msamaha na unipokee
Mema unayoyatenda, nitafanya nini mimi, nikurudishie.

Nikupe nini Mungu wangu, nikupe nini we Mwokozi Nikupe nini Bwana wangu cha kukupendeza?

Chorus
Nikupe nini Mungu wangu, nikupe nini we Mwokozi Nikupe nini Bwana wangu cha kukupendeza?

 verse1

319 Nimeahidi Yesu

kukutumikia, Wewe u Bwana wangu, U Rafiki pia; Sitaogopa vita, wewe ndiwe Mweza, Sitaiacha njia ukiniongoza.

Imbeni, Shangwe kwa Bwana

Bwana Yesu, nivute karibu 
Na wewe.

Imbeni aleluya, aleluya
Imbeni, Shangwe kwa Bwana
Yesu, ndiye mweza wetu.


verse 3
 Nikusikie wewe, nena nami,
Bwana, Kelele za dunia ndizo nyingi Sana; Nena kunihimiza au Kunionya; Nena, nikusikie mwenye Kuniponya.

Imbeni aleluya, aleluya
Imbeni, Shangwe kwa Bwana
Yesu, ndiye mweza wetu.

Huko nao; Nami nimeahidi
Kukutumikia; Nipe neema, Bwana, ya Kukwandamia.


Chorus
Imbeni aleluya, aleluya
Imbeni, Shangwe kwa Bwana
Yesu, ndiye mweza wetu.


verse 5
Hatua zako, Bwana, na
nizikanyage, Wewe U mwenye nguvu, Mimi ni mnyonge;
Niongoze, nivute, nishike
Daima, Mwishoni niwasili mbinguni Salama.


Chorus
Imbeni aleluya, aleluya
Imbeni, Shangwe kwa Bwana
Yesu, ndiye mweza wetu.

4. Nina ujasiri ,nina nguvu, niko imara kweli kweli nimebeba tunu ninaenda nimtumkie mungu wanguX2 

5. Moyo wangu unashangilia sina uoga wala hofu ninaipeleka nafsi yangu ibarikiwe naye munguX2

songs.title: Ninakupenda ewe mwokozi wangu
songs.lyrics:
Ninakupenda ewe mwokozi wangu


chorus
Ninakupenda ewe mwokozi wangu Rafiki yangu, penzi wa moyo wangu
Ukae nami, daima ndani yangu Nipate nguvu, na heri siku zote.


verse 1
Ninakutolea mwili na roho yangu
Unipe neema zako nipate nguvu
Nikae nikupendeze mwokozi wangu
Shetani mwovu kamwe asinipate.


chorus
Ninakupenda ewe mwokozi wangu Rafiki yangu, penzi wa moyo wangu
Ukae nami, daima ndani yangu Nipate nguvu, na heri siku zote.


verse 2

Nisitumbukie tena katika dhambi
Unionyeshe yaliyo ya heri kweli
Nipate kuishi kwako milele Bwana.


chorus
Ninakupenda ewe mwokozi wangu Rafiki yangu, penzi wa moyo wangu
Ukae nami, daima ndani yangu Nipate nguvu, na heri siku zote.


verse 3

Niongoze vyema siku zote
Uniangazie mwanga palipo giza
Nifike kwa Mungu Baba kwa njia yako


chorus
Ninakupenda ewe mwokozi wangu Rafiki yangu, penzi wa moyo wangu
Ukae nami, daima ndani yangu Nipate nguvu, na heri siku zote.

songs.title: NINAKUPENDA MUNGU
songs.lyrics:
NINAKUPENDA MUNGU


Ninakupenda Mungu ninakupenda wewe milele na milele nitakutukuza pokea sifa zangu, zinazotoka katika kinywa changu mimi na moyoni mwangu x2


1.Katika makusanyiko nitaziimba zaburi, Nitazitangaza sifa zako daima milele, Kwenye madhabahu yako nitaitoa sadaka, Ile ya kukupendaza Ee Mungu muumba wangu.


2.Umenitendea mengi, mema yasiyo idadi nitakushukuru bwana ee baba muumba wangu.Sifia Mungu kwa yote machozi yakimwagika ni machozi ya furaha ni machozi ya upendo.


3.Usiniache ee Bwana na wala usinitupe, ukinitupa wewe nani ataniokota, uwe  msitiri wangu katia dunia hii dunia yenye mateso na yenye maangaiko.

songs.title: NINETEENTH SUNDAY(year C)
songs.lyrics:
FIRST READING 
	Wisdom 18:6-9
By the same means by which you punished our enemies you called us to yourself and glorified us.


That night was made known beforehand to our fathers, so that they might rejoice in sure knowledge of the oaths in which they trusted. The deliverance of the righteous and the destruction of their enemies were expected by your people.


For by the same means by which you punished our enemies you called us to yourself and glorified us.
For in secret the holy children of good men offered sacrifices, and with one accord agreed to the divine law, 



that the saints would share alike the same things, both blessings and dangers; and already they were singing the praises of the fathers.
The word of the Lord.



RESPONSORIAL	RESPONSORIAL PSALM
	Psalm 33:1 and 12.18-19, 20 and 22 (R. 12b)


R.
 Blessed the people the Lord has chosen as his heritage.



Ring out your joy to the LORD, O you just; for praise is fitting for the upright.
Blessed the nation whose God is the LORD, the people he has chosen as his heritage. R.


Yes, the LORD's eyes are on those who fear him, who hope in his merciful love, to rescue their souls from death, to keep them alive in famine. R. 


Our soul is waiting for the Lord
He is our help and our shield.
May your merciful love be upon us, as we hope in you, O LORD. R.



SECOND READING
	Hebrews 11:1-2.8-	19 
He looked forward to the city whose builder and maker is God.

Brethren:
Faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen.
For by it the men of old received divine approval.


By faith Abraham obeyed when he was called to go out to a place which he was to receive as an inheritance; and he went out, not knowing where he was to go.


 By faith he sojourned in the land of promise, as in a foreign land, living in tents with Isaac and Jacob, heirs with him of the same promise.
For he looked forward to the city which has foundations, whose builder and maker is God.


By faith Sarah herself received power to conceive, even when she was past the age, since she considered him faithful who had promised.



 Therefore from one man, and him as good as dead, were born descendants as many as the stars of heaven and as the innumerable grains of sand by the seashore.
These all died in faith, not having received what was promised, but having seen it and greeted it from afar, and having acknowledged that they were strangers and exiles on the earth.


For people who speak thus make it clear that they are seeking a homeland. If they had been thinking of that land from which they had gone out, they would have had opportunity to return. But as it is, they desire a better country, that is, a heavenly one. Therefore God is not ashamed to be called their God, for he has repaired for them a city. 


By faith Abraham, when he was tested, offered up Isaac, and he who had received the promises was ready to offer up his only-begotten son, of whom it was said,
"Through Isaac shall your descendants be named."





He considered that God was able to raise men even from the dead; hence he did receive him back and this was a symbol.
The word of the Lord.




GOSPEL ACCLAMATION
 Matthew 24:42a.44
Alleluia 
Watch therefore,and be ready,the son of man is coming at an hour you do not expect.
 Alleluia

SALA
KWA AJILI YA SINODI


Ewe Roho Mtakatifu, tunasimama mbele yako tunapojumuika pamoja katika jina lako.
Tukiongozwa nawe peke yako, tunakukaribisha mioyoni mwetu;
Tufundishe njia tunayopaswa kwenda na jinsi tunavyopaswa kuifuata.
Sisi ni dhaifu na wenye dhambi; usituache kwamwe tulete machafuko.


Usiruhusu kamwe ujinga utuongoze katika njia mbaya au ushawishi matendo yetu.
Tunakuomba utuunganishe ndani yako ili tupate kusafiri pamoja tukiuendea uzima wa milele na tusaidie tusipotee kutoka katika njia ya ukweli na haki.



Tunakuomba haya yote wewe ambaye unafanya kazi kila mahali na kila wakati, katika umoja wa Baba na Mwana, milele na milele.
Amina.



SALA YA UKARIMU KWA MUNGU

Ee Mungu, miguu yangu imesimama madhabahuni mwako nikiwa na shukrani kuu moyoni mwangu kwa ulinzi wako na mema ambayo umetenda maishani mwangu. Wewe ndiye tegemeo langu katika kila jambo. 

Naomba unipe moyo wa bidii kuhudhuria ibada zote katika hekalu hili unapoishi na kutoa Baraka za kipekee. Nijalie moyo wa ukarimu ili niweze kutimiza wajibu wangu kwako na kwa kanisa lako. Naahidi kufanya yote kwa uaminifu. Kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu 
AMINA.

GOSPEL
Luke 12:32-48 
You also must be ready.

At that time:
Jesus said to his disciples, "Fear not, little flock, for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.
Sell your possessions, and give alms; provide yourselves with purses that do not grow old, with a treasure in the heavens that does not fail, 

where no thief approaches and no moth destroys. For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also .Let your loins be girded and your lamps burning, and be like men who are waiting for their master to come home from the marriage feast,

 so that they may open to him at once when he comes and knocks.
Blessed are those servants whom the master finds awake when he comes; truly, I say to you, he will put on his apron and have them sit at table, and he will come and serve them.


 If he comes in the second watch, or in the third, and finds them so, blessed are those servants! But know this, that if the householder had known at what hour the thief was coming, he would have been awake and would not have left his house to be broken into. You also must be ready; for the Son of man is coming at an hour you do not expect."



Peter said, "Lord, are you telling this parable for us or for all?" And the Lord said, "Who then is the faithful and wise steward, whom his master will set over his household, to give them their portion of food at the proper time? Blessed is that servant whom his master when he comes will find so doing.
Truly I tell you, he will set him over all his possessions.


But if that servant says to himself, G My master is delayed in coming,' and begins to beat the menservants and the maidservants, and to eat and drink and get drunk, the master of that servant
will come on a day when he does not expect him and at an hour he does not know, and will punish him, and put him with the unfaithful. 





And that servant who knew his master's will, but did not make ready or act according to his will, shall receive a severe beating. But he who did not know, and did what deserved a beating, shall receive a light beating. 






Everyone to whom much is given, of him will much be required; and of him to whom men commit much they will demand the more."
The Gospel of the Lord.



Apostles' Creed


I believe in God, the Father Almighty, Maker of heaven and earth.
And in Jesus Christ, His only begotten Son, our Lord;


who was conceived by the Holy Spirit,
born of the Virgin Mary,


suffered under Pontius Pilate,
was crucified, died, and was buried.


He descended into hell.
On the third day he rose from the dead;


He ascended into heaven,
and sits at the right hand of God the Father Almighty;


from there he shall come again to judge the living and the dead.
I believe in the Holy Spirit,


the holy catholic church,
the communion of saints,


the forgiveness of sins,
the resurrection of the body,
and the life everlasting.
AMEN.

SALA KABLA YA KOMUNIO


Ee Yesu, mkate wa mbingu, ninakututamani.
Uje kwangu uliye uzima na heri yangu.


Uje, chakula cha roho yangu, unitie imara.
Uje, Mwanakondoo wa Mungu, uondoe dhambi zangu.


Uje, mganga wa roho, uponye udhaifu wangu.
Uje, ee Yesu, uungane nami, Amina.


SALA BAADA YA KOMUNYO


KUABUDU


Ee Yesu wangu, nakuabudu moyoni mwangu ulimo, nakuungama ndiwe Bwana wangu na Mungu wangu, Mungu-Mtu na Mkombozi wangu.


Sifai mimi kukuabudu vema unavyostahili; nawaomba watakatifu na malaika wa mbinguni wakuabudu pamoja nami.


MAPENDO


Ee Yesu uliyejaa wema na mapendo, umekuja m oyoni mwangu.


Wewe Mwumba Mwenyezi umefika kwa kiumbe chako; wewe Mkombozi umefika kwa mtu mkosefu.


Umekuja kunipa hakika ya mapendo yako.  Nakupenda, Mungu wangu. Unitie mapendo, nikupende kama unavyostahili kupendwa.


SHUKRANI


Ee Yesu, nakushukuru sana kwani umenitendea makuu: umenilisha mwili wako mtukufu, umeungana nami kabisa.


Umeniongezea uzima rohoni mwangu; umenipa nguvu mpya ya kutenda mema; umenisaidia katika udhaifu wangu; nitakurudishia nini?


Umenipa moyo wako, nami nakupa moyo wangu na akili yangu, kazi zangu na mateso yangu, nafsi yangu yote.


Najitolea kuwa kitu chako kabisa.  Yesu wangu mimi ni mali yako katika maisha na saa ya kufa.


MAOMBI


Ee Yesu, mkarimu kwa wote wanaokuomba.  Uitunze neema yako, niendeleaa kukupenda.


Umetakasa mwili na roho.


Nakuomba ulimi wangu uliokugusa usiseme maneno mabaya: moyo wangu uliokupokea usitamani maovu; mwili wangu unamokaa ukutumikie kwa matendo ya haki.


Unilinde katika hatari na vishawishi;  unisaidie kuvumilia taabu na masumbuko; unizidishie upendo wako nipate kufanana nawe zaidi.


MAOMBEZI
Ee Yesu, mchungaji mwema, nakuomba uwatendee mema waliounganika nawe.


Ulinde kanisa lako lote, uwafanyizie vema jamaa zangu, rafiki na wafadhili, wakubwa na wanyonge.


Uwafariji maskini na wazee, uwainue wagonjwa na wanaozimia, uwapokee kwako roho za marehemu.


Ubariki nyumba zetu, wanyama wetu na mashamba yetu.  Utujalie mahitaji ya maisha, afya njema na riziki za kutosha.


Uwarudishie ndugu wote waliojitenga nawe waungane na kundi lako moja.  Na amani yako ikae na watu wote. Amina.


SALA YA MTAKATIFU INYASIO


Roho ya Kristu initakase.
Mwili wa Kristu uniokoe.


Damu ya Kristu inichangamshe.
Maji ya ubavu wa Kristu yanioshe.


Mateso ya Kristu nguvu yanizidishie.
Ee Yesu mwema, unisikilize.


Katika madonda yako unifiche.
Usikubali nitengane nawe.


Na adui mwovu unikinge
Saa kufa kwangu unite.


Uniamuru kwako nije.
Na watakatifu wako nikutukuze.


Milele na milele.  Amina.


KUIOMBEA PAROKIA YETU.


K.Ee Bwana Yesu Kristu, ndiwe kichwa cha kanisa lako hapa kwetu. Kwa matumaini tunakuomba kwa ajili ya waamini wote wa parokia yetu.
	


Uwalinde wote walio nyumbani na ugenini.
W.	Usikilize maombi yetu (baada ya kila aya)


K.	Uwaongoze wenye furaha na wenye huzuni
Uwasaidie wenye afya na wagonjwa
Uwavute watu wema na wenye bidii.


Uwaimarishe wote walio dhaifu.
Uwasimamishe walioanguka.


Uwahimize wavivu na wazembe.
uwaonye walio katika hatari ya kupotea.


Uwafariji wazima na wafu.


Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Kama mwanzo na sasa na siku zote na milele milele Amina x 3


Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.  Amina.

Baba ndiwe unayetawala kulala na kuamka kwangu
Juu yangu utake nini Baba kisifanyike.

songs.title: Nipoke Bwana wangu nipokee
songs.lyrics:
Nipokee Bwana wangu nipokee

1.Nipokee Bwana wangu nipokee mbele zako nipo daima,sinitupe mbali nawe miye mdhambi,nipokee Bwana wangu nipokee.

2.Nakupenda yesu mwema nakupenda kwa hiari yako u Nani,usione kosa langu nisamehe, nakupenda yesu mwema nakupenda

3.Uje Kwangu yesu mwema uje Kwangu, tumaini langu ni kwako vya dunia hudanganya,huumiza,uje  Kwangu.


4 Siondoke Yesu mwema Siondoke,nisiachiliwe gizani,kaa Nani Moto wangu wakutaka, Siondoke.





5 Ninakupa mali yangu Ninakupa,ona ninakurudisha,nifundishie kutumia vyote vyako,Ninakupa mali yangu ninakupa

songs.title: Nirudieni mimi
songs.lyrics:
NIRUDIENI MIMI

1 Fanyeni mabadiliko mioyoni  mwenu, Kwa kulia na kwa kuomboleza 
Nirudieni mimi kwa mioyo

songs.title: NIRUHUSU YESU WANGU
songs.lyrics:
NIRUHUSU YESU WANGU


CHORUS
Niruhusu Yesu wangu, niijongee meza yako, unisamehe dhambi  mwokozi uje  rohoni mwangu uniokoe


Njoo kaa ndani yangu, nami nikae ndani yako ili nipate amani tele ndani  ya roho yangu nifarijike.


Wewe bwana wanijua, wewe ndiwe tabibu pekee waroho yangu  tena ndiwe  kimbilio langu


VERSE 1
1. Tazama yesu wangu ninajongea karamu yako, pengine kwako bwana sikustahili kuijongea, unihurumie ee yesu wangu unisamehe.


VERSE 2
2. Hakika kwako bwana makosa mengi nimeyatenda, ubinadamu wangu siwezi kuficha kwako bwana, unihurumie ee yesu wangu unisamehe.


VERSE 3
3. Ni wazi yesu wangu, unaujua udhaifu wangu. Sina cha kujitolea mbele yako ee yesu wangu, unihurumie ee yesu wangu unisamehe.

songs.title: NISEME NINI BWANA (WAITHAKA)
songs.lyrics:
NISEME NINI BWANA


Niseme nini Ee Bwana, nitamke maneno gani nikushukuru jinsi gani.[tenor.. niseme) nini ee bwana nitamke nini kinywani nikush…
Nisimulie vipi mimi mapito niliyopita kuja hapa,nikutukuze vipi ee vipi Mungu.[tenor nisumulie] ee vipi mimi mapito niliyopitia] nikushukuru

Niseme tu bwana Mungu wangu asante nakushukuru.
Narudia bwana Mungu wangu asante nakushukuru.


1.	Nakumbuka nilivyojaribu,sikujua kama utajibu Nikapapasa mkono gizani kulipokucha ni tunda mkononi


2.	Katikakati ya safari, maji yote yakamwagika chini, lakini kwa wema wako ukayazoa yakajaa upya.



3.Nilipigwa,mawe,nikahaibishwa,
Tazama,leo umeniona,ukamtukuza mtumishi wako.

songs.title: NITAJONGEA MEZA YAKO
songs.lyrics:
NITAJONGEA MEZA YAKO 


Nitajongea meza yako Bwana, Yesu mwana wa Mungu unishibishe. 


1. Wewe ni mkate wauwinguni, unishibishe


2. Wewe ni maji ni ya uzima, niburudishe.


3. Wewe mzabibu nami ni tawi, nisitawishe.


4.Wewe msamaha kwa watu wote nihurumie


5. Wewe msaada kwa  wasafiri, nisaidie


6. Wewe ni njia ya uwinguni, uniongoze


7. Nazo furaha za uwinguni, ukanijaze


8. Niishi nawe ee Yesu wangu,milele yote.

songs.title: NITAKWENDA MIMI
songs.lyrics:
NITAKWENDA MIMI


1. Ee Bwana umenituma mimi (T B – Ume-nituma mimi) Na mimi Bwana,niko tayari ili nikufuate x2


Nitakwenda mimi, nitakwenda kutangaza neno, neno lako wewe. Mataifa yote wewe, na yajue kuwa wewe ndiwe Mungu.


2. Ee Bwana mimi niko tayari (B&T–Mimi-niko tayari) Kutangaza neno lako wewe,mimi niko tayari x2.


3. Ee Bwana unijalie nguvu (B&T - uni-jalie nguvu) Nguvu zako nikutumikie ewe Mungu wa-ngu x2.


4. Nijalie na upendo wako (B&T – nipe-upendo wako) niwapende na jirani zangu pia nikupe-ndex2.

songs.title: Oh  come  all ye faithful
PASAKA  MWAKA A
songs.lyrics:
SOMO LA KWANZA             
Matendo ya Mitume 2:1-11 
Wote wakajazwa Roho Mtakatifu, na wakaanza kusema lugha nyingine.



Siku ya Petekoste ilipowadia, wote walikuwapo mahali pamoja. Mara uvumi ulitoka mbinguni kama upepo mkali, ukaijaza nyumba yote walimokaa. Na ndimi kama za moto zikawatokea, 

zikagawanyika na kutua kwa kila mmoja wao. Wote wakajazwa Roho Mtakatifu, na wakaanza kusema lugha nyingine kama Roho Mtakatifu alivyowajalia kunena.


 Huko Yerusalemu walikaa Wayahudi watu wacha Mungu wa kila taifa liloko chini ya mbingu. Basi, uvumi huu ulipotukia, wengi walikutana, wakashikwa na mshangao kwa sababu kila mmoja wao aliwasikia wanasema lugha yake mwenyewe. 


Wote walishtuka, na kwa mishangao waliuliza, “Hao wote wanaosema si Wagalilaya? Kwa namna gani kila mmoja wetu anaisikia lugha aliyozaliwa nayo? Sisi Waparthi, Wamedia, Waelami, nasi tukao Mesopotamia, Yudea, na Kapadokia, 



Ponto, na Asia, Firigia na Pamfilia, Misri na wilaya za Libiya kuelekea Kirene, pia wageni waliotoka Roma, Wayahudi na waongofu, Wakrete na Waarabu, sote tunawasikia wakisema kwa lugha zetu, matendo makuu ya Mungu.”
Neno la Bwana.



SEKWENSIA

1. Uje Roh _o_ Mtakatifu,
     Tuangaz _e_ toka mbingu,
     Roho zet _u_ kwa mwangao.


2. Uje Bab _a_ wa maskini,
     Uje mto _a_ wa vipaji,
     Uje mwang _a_ wa mioyo.



3. Ee Mfarij _i_ mwema sana,
    Ee Rafik _i_ mwa(a)nana,
    Ewe rah _a_ mustarehe.




4. Kwenye kaz _i_ u pumziko,
    Kwenye jot _o_ burudisho,
    U mfutaj _i_ wa machozi.



5. Ewe mwang _a_ wenye heri,
     Uwajaz _e_ waumini,
     Neema yak _o_ mioyoni.


6. Bila nguv _u_ yako Wewe,
     Mwanadam _u_ hana kitu,
     Kwake yot _e_ yana kosa.


7. Osha mach _a_ fuko yetu,
     Panyeshe- _e_ p _a_ kavu petu,
     Na kupony _a_ majeraha.

8. Ulegez _e_ ukaidi,
     Pasha mot _o_ ubaridi,
     Nyosha up _o_ tevu wote.


9. Wape wa _a_ mini wako,
     Wenye tum _a_ ini kwako,
     Paji zak _o_ zote saba.






10. Wape tuz _o_ ya fadhila,
       Wape mwish _o_ bila ila,
       Wape her _i_ ya milele.
Amina aleluya. x3






SHANGILIO LA INJILI                                 		
 Aleluya.
   Njoo Roho mtakatifu, jaza nyoyo za waamini wako;
washa moto wamapendo ndani yao.
 Aleluya.

INJILI    
								 Yohane 20:19 – 23 
Kama baba alivyonituma mimi, nami nawatuma ninyi. Pokeeni Roho Mtakatifu.

Jioni ya siku ile ya kwanza ya juma, alikuja yesu, akasimama katikati, ingawa milango ya chumba walimokaa wafuasi ilikuwa imefungwa kwa kuwaogopa Wayahudi, akawaambia, “Amani iwe nanyi.”

 Baada ya maneno hayo, akawaonyesha mikono yake na ubavu wake. Wafuasi wakafurahi walipomwona Bwana. Yesu akawaambia mara ya pili, “Amani iwe nanyi. 


Kama Baba alivyonituma mimi, nami nawatuma ninyi.”  Baada ya maneno hayo, akawapulizia, akawaambia, “Pokeeni Roho Mtakatifu. 



Wowote mtakaowaondolea dhambi, wameondolewa, wowote mtakaofungia dhambi, wamefungiwa.”
Injili ya Bwana


ZABURI YA KUITIKIZA    
Zaburi 104: 1ab na 24 ac, 29bc – 30,31 na 34 

     


K.
 Bwana, umtume roho wako na uufanye upya uso wa nchi.




Umsifu Bwana, ee nafsi yangu!
Ee Bwana, Mungu wangu u mkuu sana!
Ee Bwana, jinsi gani zilivyo nyingi kazi zako!
dunia imejaa viumbe vyako. K.




Ukiondoa pumzi yao, wanakufa,
na kuyarudia mavumbi yao.
Ukimtuma roho wako wanaumbwa, 
na unafanya upya uso wa nchi. K.






Utukufu wa Bwana na udumu milele;
Bwana na afurahie kazi zake!
Tafakari yangu na impendeze Mungu;
nami nitafurahi katika Bwana. K.




SOMO LA PILI     
				 1 Wakorintho 12:3b – 7, 12 - 13
Kwa roho mmoja sote tumebatizwa mwili mmoja.


Ndugu zangu: Hakuna anayeweza kusema, “Yesu ni Bwana,” isipokuwa katika Roho Mtakatfu. Vipaji vya roho ni mbalimbali, lakini Roho ni mmoja.

 Huduma ni mbalimbali, lakini Bwana ni mmoja. Matendo ni mbalimbali, lakini Mungu ni mmoja atendaye yote katika wote. Kila mmoja hupewa ufunuo wa Roho kwa manufaa ya wote. 

Kristo ni kama mwili: mwili ni mmoja wenye viungo vingi. Lakini viungo vyote vya mwili huo, ijapo ni vingi, hufanya mwili mmoja. 



Kwa maana sisi sote tumebatizwa kwa Roho mmoja kuwa mwili mmoja bila tofauti baina ya Wayahudi na Wagiriki, au baina ya watumwa na watu huru. Nasi sote tumenyweshwa Roho mmoja. 
Neno la Bwana

songs.title: Pentecost  Year A
songs.lyrics:
SEKWENSIA 




1. Uje Roh _o_ Mtakatifu,
     Tuangaz _e_ toka mbingu,
     Roho zet _u_ kwa mwangao.



2. Uje Bab _a_ wa maskini,
     Uje mto _a_ wa vipaji,
     Uje mwang _a_ wa mioyo.



3. Ee Mfarij _i_ mwema sana,
    Ee Rafik _i_ mwa(a)nana,
    Ewe rah _a_ mustarehe.



4. Kwenye kaz _i_ u pumziko,
    Kwenye jot _o_ burudisho,
    U mfutaj _i_ wa machozi.


5. Ewe mwang _a_ wenye heri,
     Uwajaz _e_ waumini,
     Neema yak _o_ mioyoni.



6. Bila nguv _u_ yako Wewe,
     Mwanadam _u_ hana kitu,
     Kwake yot _e_ yana kosa.



7. Osha mach _a_ fuko yetu,
     Panyeshe- _e_ p _a_ kavu petu,
     Na kupony _a_ majeraha.

8. Ulegez _e_ ukaidi,
     Pasha mot _o_ ubaridi,
     Nyosha up _o_ tevu wote.


9. Wape wa _a_ mini wako,
     Wenye tum _a_ ini kwako,
     Paji zak _o_ zote saba.




10. Wape tuz _o_ ya fadhila,
       Wape mwish _o_ bila ila,
       Wape her _i_ ya milele.
Amina aleluya. x3




GOSPEL ACCLAMATION
 Alleluia.
Come,O Holy spirit,fill the hearts of your faithful,and kindle in them the fire of your love  
 Alleluia.

SEQUENCE



Come, Holy Spirit,
and from heaven direct on man the rays of your light.
Come, Father of the poor;
come, giver of God’s gifts;
come, light of men’s hearts.



Kindly Paraclete, in your gracious visits to man’s soul
you bring relief and consolation.
If it is weary with toil, you bring it ease;
in the heat of temptation, your grace cools it;
if sorrowful, your words console it.



Light most blessed, shine on the hearts of your faithful
even into their darkest corners;
for without your aid man can do nothing good,
and everything is sinful



Wash clean the sinful soul’
rain down your grace on the parched soul
and heal the injured soul.
Soften the hard heart,
cherish and warm the ice-cold heart,
and give direction to the wayward.






Give your seven holy gifts to your faithful,
for their trust is in you.
Give them reward for their virtuous acts;
give them a death that ensures salvation;
give unending bliss.
 Amen. Alleluia.





FIRST READING                                                                   					Acts 2:1-11
They were filled with the Holy Spirit and they began to speak other tongues.


When the day of Pentecost had come, they were all together in one place. And suddenly a sound came from heaven like the rush of a mighty wind, and it filled all the house where they were sitting.

 And there appeared to them tongues of fire, distributed and resting on each one of them. And they were all filled with the Holy Spirit and began to speak in other tongues, as the Spirit gave them utterance. 

Now there were dwelling in Jerusalem Jews, devout men from every nation under heaven. And at this sound the multitude came together, and they were bewildered, because each one heard the speaking in his own language. 

And they were amazed and wondered, saying, “Are not all these who are speaking Galileans? And how is it that we here, each of us in his own native language? Parthians and Medes and Elamites and residents of 


Mesopotamia, Judea and Cappadocia, Pontus and Asia, Phrygia and Pamphylia, Egypt and the parts of Libya belonging to Cyrene, and visitors from Rome, 





both jews and proselytes, Cretans and Arabians, we hear them telling in our own tongues the mighty works of God.”
The word of the Lord.




RESPONSORIAL PSALM 
                                 	Psalms 104: 1ab and 24ac, 29bc – 30, 31 and 34 (R.30)

R.
 Lord, send forth your Spirit, and renew the face of the earth.


Bless the LORD, O my soul!
O LORD my God, how great you are.
How many are your works, O LORD!
The earth is full of your creatures. R.



You take away their breath, they die,
returning to the dust from which they came.
You send forth your spirit, and they are created,
and you renew the face of the earth. R.






May the glory of the LORD last forever!
May the LORD rejoice in his works!
May my thoughts be pleasing to him.
I will rejoice in the LORD. R.





SECOND READING                                         1Corinthians 12: 3b – 7, 12 – 13
By one Spirit we were all baptised into one body.
A reading from the first Letter of Saint Paul to the Corinthians

Brethren: no one can say “Jesus is Lord” except by the Holy Spirit. Now there are varieties of gifts, but the same Spirit; and there are varieties of service, but the same Lord; and there are varieties of working,

 but it is the same God who inspires them all in everyone. To each is given the manifestation of the Spirit for the common good. 




For just as the body is one and has many members, and all the members of the body, though many, are one body, so it is with Christ. For by one Spirit, we are all baptised into one body – Jews or Greeks, slaves or free – and all were made to drink of one Spirit. 
The word of the Lord.




GOSPEL									 
  John 20: 19 – 23
As the Father has sent me, even so I send you: Receive the Holy Spirit.



On the evening of that day, the first day of the week, the doors being shut where the disciples were, for fear of the Jews, Jesus came and stood among them and said to them, “Peace be with you.”

 When he said this, he showed them his hands and his side. Then the disciples were glad when they saw the Lord. Jesus said to them again, “Peace be with you. 



As the Father has sent me, even so I send you.” And when he had said this, he breathed on them, and said to them, “Receive the Holy Spirit. If you forgive the sins of any, they are forgiven; if you retain the sins of any, they are retained.” 
The Gospel of the Lord

songs.title: POKEA MOYO WANGU
songs.lyrics:
POKEA MOYO WANGU


Pokea moyo wangu  ee Mungu wangu ,
Niweze kukupenda kwa pendo lako, Unipe moyo wako,Ewe yesu mkombozi wangu shinda kwangu nami daima kwako.


1.Onjeni mwone kwamba bwana yu mwema, na heri Yule mtu  Anayemtumaini yesu kristu.


2.Katika nguvu za giza katutoa, na kutukaribisha Katika ufalme wa pendo lake


3.Habari njema alituhubiria, na kutufungulia  Akatangaza mwaka wa neema


4.Mchungaji wangu mkuu ndiye bwana Yesu, sikosi kitu kamwe Huniongoza kwenye njia nyofu


5.Baraka na heshima na utukufu, na uweza kwa yeye Mwanakondoo wa Mungu milele 


NIMEVIPIGA VITA 




 Nimevipiga vita nimevipiga vita vilivyo vizuri x2
Mwendo – (mwendo nimeumaliza, Imani nimeilinda x2)





1. Baada  ya  hayo nimewekewa taji, nimewekewa  taji  taji ya haki 





   2. Ataniokoa na maneno mabaya, hata nimwimbie mfalme wa mbingu.

    



 3. Nami nitaishi ndani yake milele,tena nimwimbie  Mungu aleluya

    


 

 4. Ambaye bwana ni  mhukumu wake,ni mhukumu wake yeye mwenye  haki.

Kwa mwanao pia utuombee

songs.title: PRAYER FOR THE YEAR OF CATECHESIS
songs.lyrics:
PRAYER FOR THE YEAR OF CATECHESIS

O God, it is your will that all people come to the knowledge of the truth and be saved.
We ask you to fill our hearts with the fire of your love so that we may always learn and understand the true and holy teachings of your son Jesus Christ, 

and of your Holy Church, and get to live and implement them in our lives, until we get eternal life from you in Heaven. May you continue to blessing each one of us by the grace of your Holy Spirit so that we strive to fully live our faith in Christ.

Grant all who have not yet heard the Gospel the grace to know, love and serve you in truth and spirit all the days of their lives.
We ask this through Christ our Lord.
Lord hear us.

songs.title: PRAYER OF THE SYNOD
songs.lyrics:
PRAYER OF THE SYNOD



We stand before You, Holy Spirit, as we gather together in Your name.
With You alone to guide us, make Yourself at home in our hearts;
Teach us the way we must go and how we are to pursue it. We are weak and sinful; do not let us promote disorder.



Do not let ignorance lead us down the wrong path nor partiality influence our actions.
Let us find in You our unity so that we may journey together to eternal life and not stray from the way of fruth and what is
right.



All this we ask of You, who are at work in every place and time, in the communion of the Father and the Son, forever and ever.
Amen.

songs.title: PRESENTATION OF THE LORD 4TH SUNDAY YEAR A
songs.lyrics:
FIRST READING
	Malachi 3:1-4
“The Lord whom you seek will come to his temple.”

Thus says the Lord God: “Behold, I send my messenger to prepare the way before me, and the Lord whom you seek will suddenly come to his temple; the messenger of the covenant in whom you delight, behold, he is coming, says the Lord of hosts. 

But who can endure the day of his coming, and who can stand when he appears? 

For he is like a refiner’s fire and like fullers’ soap; he will sit as a refiner and purifier of silver, and he will purify the sons of Levi and refine them like gold and silver, till they present right offerings to the Lord. 

Then the offering of Judah and Jerusalem will be pleasing to the Lord as in the days of old and as in former years.”

RESPONSORIAL PSALM
	Psalm 24:7.8.9.10 (R. cf. 10b)

(R)
The Lord of hosts, he is the king of glory!

O gates, lift high your heads; grow higher,ancient doors.Let him enter,the king of glory!

Who is this king of glory?
The Lord, the mighty, the valiant; the Lord, the valiant in war.

O gates, lift high your heads; grow higher,ancient doors.Let him enter, the king of glory!

Who is this king of glory?
He, the Lord of hosts,he is the king of glory.

ALLELUIA
	Luke 2:32
V. Alleluia. R. Alleluia.
V. A light for revelation to the Gentiles, and for glory to your people Israel.
R. Alleluia.

SECOND READING
	Hebrews 2:14-18
"He had to be made like his brethren in every respect.”

Since the children share in flesh and blood, Jesus himself likewise partook of the same nature, that through death he might destroy him who has the power of death, that is, the devil, and deliver all those who through fear of death were subject to lifelong bondage. 

For surely it is not with angels that he is concerned but with the descendants of Abraham. 

Therefore he had to be made like his brethren in every respect, so that he might become a merciful and faithful high priest in the service of God, to make expiation for the sins of the people. 

For because he himself has suffered and been tempted, he is able to help those who are tempted.

GOSPEL
	Luke 2:22-40
“My eyes have seen your salvation.”  

When the time came for their purification according to the law of Moses, the parents of Jesus brought him up to Jerusalem to present him to the Lord (as it is written in the law of the Lord, 

“Every male that opens the womb shall be called holy to the Lord”) and to offer a sacrifice according to what is said in the law of the Lord, “a pair of turtledoves, or two young pigeons.”

Now there was a man in Jerusalem, whose name was Simeon, and this man was righteous and devout, looking for the consolation of Israel, and the Holy Spirit was upon him. 

And it had been revealed to him by the Holy Spirit that he should not see death before he had seen the Lord’s Christ. 

And inspired by the Spirit he came into the temple; and when the parents brought in the child Jesus, to do for him according to the custom of the law, he took him up in his arms and blessed God and said,

“Lord, now let your servant depart in peace,according to your word;for my eyes have seen your salvation which you have prepared in the presence of all peoples,a light for revelation to the Gentiles,and for glory to your people Israel.” 

*	And his father and his mother marvelled at what was said about him; and Simeon blessed them and said to Mary his mother,

“Behold, this child is set for the fall and rising of many in Israel,and for a sign that is spoken against(and a sword will pierce through your own soul also),that thoughts out of many hearts may be revealed.”

And there was a prophetess, Anna, the daughter of Phanuel, of the tribe of Asher; she was of a great age, having lived with her husband seven years from her virginity, and as a widow till she was eighty-four. 

She did not depart from the temple, worshipping with fasting and prayer night and day. And coming up at that very hour she gave thanks to God, and spoke of him to all who were looking for the redemption of Jerusalem.

And when they had performed everything according to the law of the Lord, they returned into Galilee, to their own city, Nazareth. And the child grew and became strong, filled with wisdom; and the favour of God was upon him.

songs.title: RARUENI MIOYO YENU
songs.lyrics:
RARUENI MIOYO YENU 

Rarueni mioyo yenu wala sio mavazi yenu mkamrudie

songs.title: SADAKA YANGU
songs.lyrics:
SADAKA YANGU
@ Fr. A. Kauki


Sadaka yangu, kwako ee Mungu
Ni moyo mnyofu na uliopondeka
Tazama wapendezwa na kweli ya moyo
Nawe wanijulisha hekima kwa siri
Nioshe kabisa na uovu wangu wote
Na kinywa changu kitanena sifa zako


1.Maana wewe Bwana hupendezwi
Na dha-bihu za kuteketezwa
Ama- sivyo mimi ningalikutolea


2.Wapendezwa na dhabihu za haki
Kuto-ka- kwa moyo mnyofu
Zitolewazo juu ya madhabahu yako


3.Ee Mungu wa wokovu wangu
Unipe moyo radhi wa utii
Usiniondolee Roho wako Mtakatifu

songs.title: SALA KABLA NA BAAADA YA KOMUNIO
songs.lyrics:
SALA KABLA YA KOMUNIO


Ee Yesu, mkate wa mbingu, ninakututamani.
Uje kwangu uliye uzima na heri yangu.


Uje, chakula cha roho yangu, unitie imara.
Uje, Mwanakondoo wa Mungu, uondoe dhambi zangu.


Uje, mganga wa roho, uponye udhaifu wangu.
Uje, ee Yesu, uungane nami, Amina.


SALA BAADA YA KOMUNIO


SALA YA MTAKATIFU INYASIO


Roho ya Kristu initakase.
Mwili wa Kristu uniokoe.


Damu ya Kristu inichangamshe.
Maji ya ubavu wa Kristu yanioshe.


Mateso ya Kristu nguvu yanizidishie.
Ee Yesu mwema, unisikilize.


Katika madonda yako unifiche.
Usikubali nitengane nawe.


Na adui mwovu unikinge
Saa kufa kwangu unite.


Uniamuru kwako nije.
Na watakatifu wako nikutukuze.


Milele na milele.  Amina.


KUIOMBEA PAROKIA YETU.


K.Ee Bwana Yesu Kristu, ndiwe kichwa cha kanisa lako hapa kwetu. Kwa matumaini tunakuomba kwa ajili ya waamini wote wa parokia yetu.
 


Uwalinde wote walio nyumbani na ugenini.
W. Usikilize maombi yetu (baada ya kila aya)


K. Uwaongoze wenye furaha na wenye huzuni
Uwasaidie wenye afya na wagonjwa
Uwavute watu wema na wenye bidii.


Uwaimarishe wote walio dhaifu.
Uwasimamishe walioanguka.


Uwahimize wavivu na wazembe.
uwaonye walio katika hatari ya kupotea.


Uwafariji wazima na wafu.


Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Kama mwanzo na sasa na siku zote na milele milele Amina x 3


Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.  
Amina.

songs.title: SALA 2
songs.lyrics:
SALA KABLA YA KOMUNIO


Ee Yesu, mkate wa mbingu, ninakututamani.
Uje kwangu uliye uzima na heri yangu.


Uje, chakula cha roho yangu, unitie imara.
Uje, Mwanakondoo wa Mungu, uondoe dhambi zangu.


Uje, mganga wa roho, uponye udhaifu wangu.
Uje, ee Yesu, uungune nami, Amina.


SALA BAADA YA KOMUNYO


KUABUDU


Ee Yesu wangu, nakuabudu moyoni mwangu ulimo, nakuungama ndiwe Bwana wangu na Mungu wangu, Mungu-Mtu na Mkombozi wangu.


Sifai mimi kukuabudu vema unavyostahili; nawaomba watakatifu na malaika wa mbinguni wakuabudu pamoja nami.


MAPENDO


Ee Yesu uliyejaa wema na mapendo, umekuja m oyoni mwangu.


Wewe Mwumba Mwenyezi umefika kwa kiumbe chako; wewe Mkombozi umefika kwa mtu mkosefu.


Umekuja kunipa hakika ya mapendo yako.  Nakupenda, Mungu wangu. Unitie mapendo, nikupende kama unavyostahili kupendwa.


SHUKRANI


Ee Yesu, nakushukuru sana kwani umenitendea makuu: umenilisha mwili wako mtukufu, umeungana nami kabisa.


Umeniongezea uzima rohoni mwangu; umenipa nguvu mpya ya kutenda mema; umenisaidia katika udhaifu wangu; nitakurudishia nini?


Umenipa moyo wako, nami nakupa moyo wangu na akili yangu, kazi zangu na mateso yangu, nafsi yangu yote.


Najitolea kuwa kitu chako kabisa.  Yesu wangu mimi ni mali yako katika maisha na saa ya kufa.


MAOMBI


Ee Yesu, mkarimu kwa wote wanaokuomba.  Uitunze neema yako, niendelee kukupenda.


Umetakasa mwili na roho.


Nakuomba ulimi wangu uliokugusa usiseme maneno mabaya: moyo wangu uliokupokea usitamani maovu; mwili wangu unamokaa ukutumikie kwa matendo ya haki.


Unilinde katika hatari na vishawishi;  unisaidie kuvumilia taabu na masumbuko; unizidishie upendo wako nipate kufanana nawe zaidi.


MAOMBEZI
Ee Yesu, mchungaji mwema, nakuomba uwatendee mema waliounganika nawe.


Ulinde kanisa lako lote, uwafanyizie vema jamaa zangu, rafiki na wafadhili, wakubwa na wanyonge.


Uwafariji maskini na wazee, uwainue wagonjwa na wanaozimia, uwapokee kwako roho za marehemu.


Ubariki nyumba zetu, wanyama wetu na mashamba yetu.  Utujalie mahitaji ya maisha, afya njema na riziki za kutosha.


Uwarudishie ndugu wote waliojitenga nawe waungane na kundi lako moja.  Na amani yako ikae na watu wote. Amina.


SALA YA MTAKATIFU INYASIO


Roho ya Kristu initakase.
Mwili wa Kristu uniokoe.


Damu ya Kristu inichangamshe.
Maji ya ubavu wa Kristu yanioshe.


Mateso ya Kristu nguvu yanizidishie.
Ee Yesu mwema, unisikilize.


Katika madonda yako unifiche.
Usikubali nitengane nawe.


Na adui mwovu unikinge
Saa kufa kwangu unite.


Uniamuru kwako nije.
Na watakatifu wako nikutukuze.


Milele na milele.  Amina.


KUIOMBEA PAROKIA YETU.


K.Ee Bwana Yesu Kristu, ndiwe kichwa cha kanisa lako hapa kwetu. Kwa matumaini tunakuomba kwa ajili ya waamini wote wa parokia yetu.
	


Uwalinde wote walio nyumbani na ugenini.
W.	Usikilize maombi yetu (baada ya kila aya)


K.	Uwaongoze wenye furaha na wenye huzuni
Uwavute watu wema na wenye bidii.


Uwaimarishe wote walio dhaifu.
Uwasimamishe walioanguka.


Uwahimize wavivu na wazembe.
uwaonye walio katika hatari ya kupotea.


Uwafariji wazima na wafu.


Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Kama mwanzo na sasa na siku zote na milele milele Amina x 3


Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.  Amina.

songs.title: SALA KWA AJILI YA MWAKA WA KATEKESI
songs.lyrics:
SALA KWA AJILI YA MWAKA WA KATEKESI

Ee Mungu, ni mapenzi yako kuwa watu wote wapate kuujua ukweli na waokoke. Tunaomba uijaze mioyo yetu na moto wa upendo wako, tupate siku zote kujifunza na kuyaelewa mafundisho ya kweli na matakatifu ya mwanao Yesu Kristu, 

na ya Kanisa lako Takatifu, na kupata kuyaishi na kuyatekeleza maishani mwetu, hadi tuupate uzima wa milele kwako Mbinguni.

Tunakuomba uzidi kumbariki kila mmoja wetu kwa mapaji ya Roho wako Mtakatifu, tunapojibidiisha kuishi kikamilifu imani yetu kwa Kristu. 

Wajalie wote ambao bado hawajaisikia Injili, neema ya kukujua, kukupenda na kukutumikia, katika kweli na roho siku zote za maisha yao.
Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristu Bwana wetu.

songs.title: SALA KWA AJILI YA NCHI YETU YA KENYA
songs.lyrics:
SALA KWA AJILI YA NCHI YETU YA KENYA

Kiongozi: Ee Mungu Mwenyezi wa milele, Baba wa mataifa yote na wa watu wote utuangalie kwa huruma sisi watu wako wa Kenya. Kwa baraka yako utuwezeshe kuishi maisha mema kama iwapasavyo wana wako. 


Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu. (Baada ya kila Jungu) 


Kiongozi: Uwaangaze watawala wetu. Sheria wanazotunga zilingane na sheria yako wewe uliyetuumba kwa ajili yako, tena zitusaidie kupata manufaa ya hapa duniani. 


Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu
 


Kiongozi: Uwajalie watu wote kipaji cha amani. Utupe hekima ya kutafuta ukweli na haki katika mambo yote na kuishi kadiri ya amri zako. 

Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu 


Kiongozi: Uwashe moto wa mapendo yako mioyoni mwetu. Mapendo hayo yatusaidie kushinda utengano, ushindani na chuki ya ukabila. 

Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu 


Kiongozi: Utuunganishe sisi sote kwa mwungano wa kidugu, tupate kwa msaada wa neema yako kuwa na umoja katika wewe, Baba wa wote.  


Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu


Kiongozi: Ubariki taifa letu, liweze kusitawi na kushika amani na mataifa mengine.

Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu 


Kiongozi: Uwaongoze watumishi wote wa serikali, ili watimize wajibu na kazi zao sawasawa.

Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu


Kiongozi: Uwasaidie raia wote wa Kenya kujipatia hali njema, haki na heshima. Utufadhilie kufikia kipeo ulichotutayarishia, yaani kuwa raia katika ufalme wa Mbinguni, pale unapoishi na kutawala daima na milele. 


Wote: Ubariki nchi yetu


TUOMBE: Ee Mungu Mwenyezi wa milele, ndiwe uliye na uwezo juu ya mioyo ya watu wote, na unayashikilia mataifa yote duniani. Tunakuomba kwa wema wako usaidie nchi yetu ya Kenya, 

kwa hisani yako uwaongoze wote wenye mamlaka ya serikali na ya Kanisa Pamoja na raia wote, wazidi kuzingatia uadilifu, uwajibikaji, kazi njema, wawe wasikivu na kujali mahitaji ya raia wote. 

Utujalie amani, haki, umoja, ukarimu na ukweli, ili tuishi katika mapendo halisi. Wote wafanye kazi kwa bidii. 

Fukuza ufisadi na hali ya utumiaji mbaya wa rasilimali ili kuwe na rasilimali za kutosha kustawisha nchi yetu katika nyanja zote.

Uhai uzidi kulindwa na kila mmoja aishi katika undugu na ujirani mwema.
Tunaomba haya kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.
Wote: Amina.�

songs.title: SALA YA KUMWOMBA MTAKATIFU YOSEFU
songs.lyrics:
Ee Yosefu Mwenye heri, tunakimbilia kwako, katika masumbuko yetu; na kisha omba shime, ya mchumba wako mtakatifu, tunaomba pia kwa matumaini, usimamizi wako. Kwa ajili ya mapendo,

uliyompenda Bikira mtakatifu, mzazi wa Mungu, na kwa ajili, ya kumtunza Mtoto Yesu, twakuomba sana,utuangalie kwa wako, sisi tuliokuwa, fungu Iake Yesu Kristu, tukakombolewa, kwa damu yake.

Utusimamie, katika masumbuko yetu, kwa enzi na shime yako. Ee mlinzi amini, wa jamaa takatifu, uwakinge watoto wateule, wa Yesu Kristu. Ee Baba, uliyetupenda mno, utuepushe na kilema chochote,

cha madanganyo na upotevu. Ee kinga yetu mwezaji, utusimamie huko juu mbinguni ulipo, tunaposhindana na wenye nguvu, wakaao gizani, kama vile siku za kale, ukamwopoa Mtoto Yesu,'

katika hatari ya kuuawa, na leo hivi, likinge kanisa lako takatifu, katika mitego ya adui,.na katika shida yote; mtunze daima, kila mmoja.

wetu, kwa mfano wako, ili tupate na msaada wako, kukaa na utakatifu, maishani mwetu,.kufa kifo chema na kupata mbinguni, makao ya raha milele. Amina.

songs.title: SALA YA KUWEKA KIAPO KWA UONGOZI WA KANISA LA MUNGU
songs.lyrics:
SALA YA KUWEKA KIAPO KWA UONGOZI WA KANISA LA MUNGU


Ee Mungu, ninakushukuru kwa kuniumba kwa mfano na sura yako na kuniweka 
hapa duniani ili siku zote nikazidi kukutumikia wewe ndani ya watu wako, 
maisha yangu yote hadi uzima wa milele nawe mbinguni. 


Ninakuomba unijaze na mapaji ya Roho wako Mtakatifu ili nizidi kukutumikia 
kwa uaminifu, furaha, upole, unyenyekevu, mapendo na kwa uhodari na 
ushupavu ndani ya hawa wapendwa wako walio nichagua kwa nafasi hii.



Niwezeshe siku zote kwa nguvu ya neema yako, nijitolee kikamilifu kuhudhuria 
mikutano yote vyema, nichangie kwa hali na mali kwa mshikamano mwema wa 
Imani, kwa maendeleo yote ya imani, kijamii na kiutu. 



Wajalie wote walionichagua wazidi kuwa wasikivu na wenye uwajibikaji, 
maana ni wewe unatenda kazi zote njema kupitia sisi unaotupenda. 
Zidi kutubariki kila mmoja wetu kwa wingi wa amani, mapendo na matumaini. 




Wajalie wote kupitia uongozi wetu unaoangaziwa na Neno lako Takatifu, waje 
katika kweli yako na waishi siku zote katika kukujua, kukupenda na 
kukutumikia, ili ulimwengu mzima ujawe na Roho ya Injili yako Takatifu.
Tunaomba haya kwa njia ya Kristu Bwana na Mkombozi wetu, 
Wote: Amina

songs.title: Sala ya Mt. Monika
songs.lyrics:
Sala ya Bikira Maria


Ee Bikira imakulata, uliyekingwa dhambi ya asili na dhambi zote zingine, uliyeelekeza moyo wako safi kwa Mungu, 

na uliyetimiza daima mapenzi yake tu. Basi uniombee nipate neema ya kuchukia dhambi kwa moyo wote na kufuata mfano wako bora wa kumtii Mungu katika mambo yote, 


saa ya kufa kwangu unipeleke safi na bila kosa mbele ya Bwana mwamuzi wangu. 
Amina.


Sala ya Mt. Monika


Ee Mungu, mfariji kwa wenye uchungu, mkombozi kwa wenye kutumaini kwako, 

uliyepokea kwa wema machozi ya Mt. Monika mwenye heri kwa kumgeuza mwanaye Augustino, utujalie kwa maombezi ya hao wawili, 

tupate kuzililia dhambi zetu, na kupata rehema ya neema yako kwa ajili ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristu. 
Amina.

Sala ya kujitolea kuwa mtumishi mwaminifu wa Bwana

Ee Yesu Mkombozi wetu, ututazame sisi tulionyenyekea mbele ya Altare yako. Twataka kuwa mali yako na kupata kuungana zaidi nawe,

kila mmo- ja wetu anajitolea leo kwa hiari yake kuwa mtumishi wako mwaminifu. 

Ee Bwana, tunapenda kuwa waaminifu katika maisha yetu ya kikristu, 

tukifuata mfano bora wa Bikira Maria na wa Mtakatifu Monika walio waombezi na wasimamizi wa shirika letu. 

Tudumishe katika Imani, Mapendo na Matumaini; ili tuwe kielelezo katika familia zetu, shirika
letu na kwa Kanisa nzima. 

Nawe Bikira Maria Mama wa Mungu na mama wa Kanisa utuombee kwa Mwanao na pia ulisimamie shirika letu la aki- na mama hapa Parokiani mwetu.

songs.title: SALA YA MT. YOSEFU
songs.lyrics:
SALA YA MT. YOSEFU

Ee Mt. Yosefu mwenye heri, tunakimbilia kwako katika masumbuko yetu, na kisha omba shime ya Mchumba wako Mtakatifu, tunaomba pia kwa matumaini usimamizi wako.

 Kwa ajili ya mapendo uliyompenda Bikira Mtakatifu Mzazi wa Mungu, na kwa ajili ya kumtunza Mtoto Yesu, twakuomba sana, 

utuangalie kwa wema sie tuliokuwa fungu lake Yesu Kristu, tukakombolewa kwa damu yake. Tusimamie katika masumbuko yetu kwa enzi na shime yako.

Ee Mlinzi amini wa jamaa takatifu, uwakinge watoto wateule wa Yesu Kristu.

Ee Baba uliyetupenda mno tuepushe na kilema chochote cha madanganyo na upotevu. Ee kinga yetu mwezaji, 

utusimamie huko juu mbinguni ulipo, tunaposhindana na wenye nguvu wakaao gizani.

 Kama vile siku za kale ukamwopoa Mtoto Yesu katika hatari ya kuuawa, na leo hivi likinge Kanisa Takatifu la Mungu katika mitego ya adui, na katika shida yote; 

mtunze daima kila mmoja wetu, tufwate mfano wako, ili tupate na msaada wako, kukaa na utakatifu maisha, kufa kifo chema, na kupata mbinguni makao ya raha milele.
Amina

songs.title: SALA YA MTAKATIFU YOSEFU
songs.lyrics:
SALA YA MTAKATIFU YOSEFU

Ee Yosefu mwenye heri, tunakimbilia kwako katika masumbuko yetu; na kisha omba shime ya Mchumba wako Mtakatifu,
tunaomba pia kwa matumaini usimamizi wako. 

Kwa ajili ya mapendo uliyompenda Bikira Mtakatifu mzazi wa Mungu, na kwa ajili ya kumtunza mtoto Yesu, twakuomba sana, utuangalie kwa wema siye tuliokuwa fungu lake Yesu Kristu, tukakombolewa kwa damu yake. Tusimamie katika masumbuko yetu kwa enzi na shime yako.

Ewe mlezi mwaminifu wa Familia Takatifu, uipe kibali familia yetu ya kiroho washiriki wote wa Jumuiya yetu ya Kikatoliki, utuunganishe kila wakati katika vifungo vya imani na upendo, na tubaki daima kwa moyo mmoja, akili na roho moja katika Moyo Mtakatifu wa Yesu na Moyo safi wa Bikira Maria.

Ee mlinzi amini wa jamaa takatifu, uwakinge watoto wateule wa Yesu Kristu. Ee Baba uliyetupenda mno tuepushe na kilema chochote cha madanganyo na upotevu. Ee kinga yetu mwezaji, utusimamie huko juu Mbinguni ulipo, tunaposhindana na wenye nguvu wakaao gizani,

 Kama vile siku za kale ukamwopoa mtoto Yesu katika hatari ya kuuawa, na leo hivi likinge Kanisa takatifu la Mungu katika mitego ya adui, na katika shida yote; mtunze daima kila mmoja wetu, kwa mfano wako, ili tupate na msaada wako, kukaa na utakatifu wa maisha, kufa kifo chema, na kupata Mbinguni makao ya raha milele. 
Amina.

songs.title: SALA YA SINODI
songs.lyrics:
SALA
KWA AJILI YA SINODI


Ewe Roho Mtakatifu, tunasimama mbele yako tunapojumuika pamoja katika jina lako.
Tukiongozwa nawe peke yako, tunakukaribisha mioyoni mwetu;
Tufundishe njia tunayopaswa kwenda na jinsi tunavyopaswa kuifuata.
Sisi ni dhaifu na wenye dhambi; usituache kwamwe tulete machafuko.


Usiruhusu kamwe ujinga utuongoze katika njia mbaya au ushawishi matendo yetu.
Tunakuomba utuunganishe ndani yako ili tupate kusafiri pamoja tukiuendea uzima wa milele na tusaidie tusipotee kutoka katika njia ya ukweli na haki.



Tunakuomba haya yote wewe ambaye unafanya kazi kila mahali na kila wakati, katika umoja wa Baba na Mwana, milele na milele.
Amina.

songs.title: SALA YA UKARIMU KWA MUNGU
songs.lyrics:
SALA YA UKARIMU KWA MUNGU

Ee Mungu, miguu yangu imesimama madhabahuni mwako nikiwa na shukrani kuu moyoni mwangu kwa ulinzi wako na mema ambayo umetenda maishani mwangu. Wewe ndiye tegemeo langu katika kila jambo. 

Naomba unipe moyo wa bidii kuhudhuria ibada zote katika hekalu hili unapoishi na kutoa Baraka za kipekee. 

Nijalie moyo wa ukarimu ili niweze kutimiza wajibu wangu kwako na kwa kanisa lako. Naahidi kufanya yote kwa uaminifu. Kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu 
AMINA.

songs.title: SALA YA UTAKASO
songs.lyrics:
SALA YA UTAKASO

Mungu mwenyezi Baba wa Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo, Nayakabidhi mapito yangu yote kwako. Naweka moyo wangu na maisha yangu mikononi mwako. Naahidi moyo wa kutii katika utumishi wangu kwako. Naomba uyatakase mambo yote katika maisha yangu yaani familia yangu,



 watoto wangu, kazi zangu, biashara yangu, shamba langu, wanyama wangu na kila kitu ulichonijalia. Nivunjie minyororo yote ya laana katika maisha yangu. Nifungulie mifereji ya Baraka zitiririke kutoka kwako na unijalie urejesho katika maisha yangu sasa na milele 
AMINA.

songs.title: SISTER
songs.lyrics:
GOSPEL
 Luke 10:1-9 
 
 

After this the Lord appointed seventy-two [a] others and sent them two by two ahead of him to every town and place where he was about to go.  He told them, “The harvest is plentiful, but the workers are few. 

Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field. Go! I am sending you out like lambs among wolves. 

Do not take a purse or bag or sandals; and do not greet anyone on the road.
The Gospel of the lord

SECOND READING
Romans 8:28-30 
 

And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.  

For those God foreknew he also predestined to be conformed to the image of his Son, that he might be the firstborn among many brothers and sisters.  

And those he predestined, he also called; those he called, he also justified; those he justified, he also glorified. 
The word of the Lord


FIRST READING
Jeremiah 1:4-10 

And we know that The word of the Lord came to me, saying: “Before I formed you in the womb I knew you,before you were born I set you apart; I appointed you as a prophet to the nations.”  

“Alas, Sovereign Lord,” I said, “I do not know how to speak: I am too young." But the Lord said to me, “Do not say, ‘I am too young.’ You must go to everyone I send you to and say whatever I command you.  

Do not be afraid of them, for I am with you and will rescue you,” declares the Lord. Then the Lord reached out his hand and touched my mouth and said to me, 

“I have put my words in your mouth. See, today I appoint you over nations and kingdoms to uproot and tear down, to destroy and overthrow, to build and to plant.” 
The word of the Lord

RESPONSORIAL PSALM
Psalm 116:12-13.14-15.16-17 (R. 12)




R
How can I repay the Lord for all his goodness to me?

How can I repay the LORD for all his goodness to me? The cup of salvation I will raise; I will call on the name of the LORD. R.


My vows to the LORD I will fulfil before all his people. How precious in the eyes of the LORD is the death of his faithful. R.


Your servant, LORD, your servant am I, the son of your handmaid; you have loosened my bonds. A thanksgiving sacrifice I make; I will call on the name of the LORD. R.


GOSPEL ACCLAMATION
See John 6:63c,68c
Alleluia
 Your words, Lord, are Spirit and life; you have the words eternal life. 
Alleluia.

1. Maisha yangu [yote] nakutolea [wewe] Eh Mungu wangu [Bwana] unipokee [Kwako]x2 


Bwana maisha yangu mimi nampa Bwana x2, 
Nilivyo- navyo vyote ni mali ya Bwana Maisha yangu yote nampa Bwana x2

2. Ujana wangu [mimi], ulionipa [wewe] x1, najitolea [kwako ] kukuhudumu [wewe] x2


3. Uzee wangu ulionipa najitolea kukuhudumu

4. Nimeamua [mimi] na nyumba yangu [yote] x1, kumtumikia [Mungu] milele (yote) x2

SALA KABLA YA KOMUNIO


Ee Yesu, mkate wa mbingu, ninakututamani.
Uje kwangu uliye uzima na heri yangu.


Uje, chakula cha roho yangu, unitie imara.
Uje, Mwanakondoo wa Mungu, uondoe dhambi zangu.


Uje, mganga wa roho, uponye udhaifu wangu.
Uje, ee Yesu, uungane nami, Amina.


SALA BAADA YA KOMUNIO


SALA YA MTAKATIFU INYASIO


Roho ya Kristu initakase.
Mwili wa Kristu uniokoe.


Damu ya Kristu inichangamshe.
Maji ya ubavu wa Kristu yanioshe.


Mateso ya Kristu nguvu yanizidishie.
Ee Yesu mwema, unisikilize.


Katika madonda yako unifiche.
Usikubali nitengane nawe.


Na adui mwovu unikinge
Saa kufa kwangu unite.


Uniamuru kwako nije.
Na watakatifu wako nikutukuze.


Milele na milele.  Amina.


KUIOMBEA PAROKIA YETU.


K.Ee Bwana Yesu Kristu, ndiwe kichwa cha kanisa lako hapa kwetu. Kwa matumaini tunakuomba kwa ajili ya waamini wote wa parokia yetu.
 


Uwalinde wote walio nyumbani na ugenini.
W. Usikilize maombi yetu (baada ya kila aya)


K. Uwaongoze wenye furaha na wenye huzuni
Uwasaidie wenye afya na wagonjwa
Uwavute watu wema na wenye bidii.


Uwaimarishe wote walio dhaifu.
Uwasimamishe walioanguka.


Uwahimize wavivu na wazembe.
uwaonye walio katika hatari ya kupotea.


Uwafariji wazima na wafu.


Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
Kama mwanzo na sasa na siku zote na milele milele Amina x 3


Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu.  
Amina.


SALA YA UKARIMU KWA MUNGU

Ee Mungu, miguu yangu imesimama madhabahuni mwako nikiwa na shukrani kuu moyoni mwangu kwa ulinzi wako na mema ambayo umetenda maishani mwangu. Wewe ndiye tegemeo langu katika kila jambo. 

Naomba unipe moyo wa bidii kuhudhuria ibada zote katika hekalu hili unapoishi na kutoa Baraka za kipekee. 

Nijalie moyo wa ukarimu ili niweze kutimiza wajibu wangu kwako na kwa kanisa lako. Naahidi kufanya yote kwa uaminifu. Kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu 
AMINA.

SALA KWA AJILI YA MWAKA WA KATEKESI

Ee Mungu, ni mapenzi yako kuwa watu wote wapate kuujua ukweli na waokoke. Tunaomba uijaze mioyo yetu na moto wa upendo wako, tupate siku zote kujifunza na kuyaelewa mafundisho ya kweli na matakatifu ya mwanao Yesu Kristu, 

na ya Kanisa lako Takatifu, na kupata kuyaishi na kuyatekeleza maishani mwetu, hadi tuupate uzima wa milele kwako Mbinguni.

Tunakuomba uzidi kumbariki kila mmoja wetu kwa mapaji ya Roho wako Mtakatifu, tunapojibidiisha kuishi kikamilifu imani yetu kwa Kristu. 

Wajalie wote ambao bado hawajaisikia Injili, neema ya kukujua, kukupenda na kukutumikia, katika kweli na roho siku zote za maisha yao.
Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristu Bwana wetu.




KANUNI YA IMANI

Nasadiki kwa Mungu mmoja,
Baba Mwenyezi,
Mwumba wa mbingu na dunia
na vitu vyote vinavyoonekana na visivyoonekana.

Nasadiki kwa Bwana mmoja Yesu Kristo,
Mwana pekee wa Mungu,
aliyezaliwa kwa Baba tangu milele yote.

Mungu aliyetoka kwa Mungu, Mwanga kwa mwanga,
Mungu kweli kwa Mungu kweli,
aliyezaliwa bila kuumbwa, mwenye umungu mmoja na Baba,
ambaye vitu vyote vimeumbwa naye.

Alishuka kutoka Mbinguni, kwa ajili yetu sisi wanadamu,
na kwa ajili ya wokovu wetu.
Akapata mwili kwa uwezo wa Roho Mtakatifu
kwake yeye Bikira Maria, akawa mwanadamu.

Akasulubiwa kwa ajili yetu sisi, kwa mamlaka ya Ponsyo Pilato; akateswa, akafa na akazikwa,
siku ya tatu akafufuka, kadiri ya Maandiko,
akapaa mbinguni, ameketi kuume kwa Baba.

Atakuja tena kwa utukufu, kuwahukumu wazima na wafu,
na ufalme wake hautakuwa na mwisho.
Nasadiki kwa Roho Mtakatifu, Bwana na mleta uzima,
atokaye kwa Baba na Mwana.

Anayeabudiwa na kutukuzwa, pamoja na Baba na Mwana,
aliyenena kwa vinywa vya manabii.
Nasadiki kwa kanisa moja, takatifu, katoliki, la mitume.

Naungama ubatizo mmoja kwa maondoleo ya dhambi.
Nangojea ufufuko wa wafu,
na uzima wa milele ijayo. 
Amina.


Misa st Michael

4.neno liniongeze nimuepuke shetani nimulikie watu wawe watumishi wako X2

NICENE CREED

I believe in one God,
the Father almighty,
maker of heaven and earth,
of all things visible and invisible.

I believe in one Lord Jesus Christ,
the Only Begotten Son of God,
born of the Father before all ages.

God from God, Light from Light,
true God from true God,
begotten, not made, consubstantial with the Father;
through him all things were made.

For us men and for our salvation
he came down from heaven,
and by the holy spirit was incarnate of the Virgin Mary,
and became man.

For our sake he was crucified under Pontius Pilate,
he suffered death and was buried,
and rose again on the third day
in accordance with the Scriptures.

He ascended into heaven
and is seated at the right hand of the Father.
He will come again in glory
to judge the living and the dead
and his kingdom will have no end.

I believe in the Holy Spirit, the Lord, the giver of Life,
who proceeds from the Father and the Son,
who with the Father and the Son is adored and glorified,
who has spoken through the Prophets.

I believe in one, holy, catholic and apostolic Church.
I confess one Baptism for the forgiveness of sins
and I look forward to the resurrection of the dead
and the life of the world to come.
 Amen

songs.title: SIXTH SUNDAY OF EASTER
songs.lyrics:
FIRST READING      
     Acts 8:5-8,14-17
They laid hands on them, and they received the Holy Spirit.



In those days: Philip went down to a city of Samaria, and proclaimed to them the Christ. And the multitudes with one accord gave heed to what was said by Philip, when they heard him and saw the signs which he did. 

For unclean sprits came out of many who were possessed, crying with a loud voice; and many who were paralyzed or lame were healed. So there was much joy in that city. Now when the apostles at Jerusalem heard that Samaria had received the word of God,


they sent to them Peter and John, who came down and prayed for them that they might receive the Holy Spirit; for the Spirit had not yet fallen on any of them, 





but they had only been baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus. Then they laid their hands on them and they received the Holy Spirit. 
The word of the Lord.






RESPONSORIAL PSALM 
          	Psalms 66: 1-3a, 4-5, 6-7a, 16 and 20 (R. 1)


R. 
Cry out with joy to God, all the earth.


Cry out with joy to God, all the earth;
O sing to the glory of his name.
O render him glorious praise.
Say to God, “How awesome your deed! R.


Before you all the earths shall bow down
shall sing to you,
sing to your name!”
Come and see the works of God,
awesome his deed among the children of men. R.



He turned the sea into dry land;
they passed through the river on foot.
Let our joy, then, be in him;
he rules forever by his might. R.







Come and hear, all who fear God;
I will tell what he did for my soul.
Blest be God, who did not reject my prayer,
nor withhold from me his merciful love. R.






SECOND READING                                                                           1 Peter 3:15-18
Put to death in the flesh, he was made alive in the Spirit.


Beloved: in your hearts reverence Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to make a defence to anyone who calls you to account for the hope that is in you, yet do it with gentleness and reverence; 

and keep your conscience clear, so that, when you are abuse, those who revile your good behavior in Christ may be put to shame. For it is better to suffer for doing right, if that should be God’s will, than for doing wrong. 




For Christ also died for sins once for all, the righteous for the unrighteous, that he might bring us to God, being put to death in the flesh but made alive in the spirit.
 The word of the Lord.





       GOSPEL ACCLAMATION John 14:23
 Alleluia.
If a man loves me, he will keep my word, says the Lord; and my Father will love him, and we will come to him.
 Alleluia.



GOSPEL									  
 John 14:15-21
I will ask the Father, and he will give another Counsellor.



At that time: Jesus said to his disciples, “If you love me, you will keep my commandments. And I will ask the Father, and he will give you another Counsellor, to be with you for ever, even the Spirit of truth, 

whom the world cannot receive, because it neither sees him nor knows him; you know him, for he dwells with you, and will be with you. I will not leave you desolate; I will come to you. 

Yet a little while, and the world will see me no more, but you will see me; because I live, you will live also. In that day you will know that I am in my Father, and you in me, and I in you. 





He who has my commandments and keeps them, he it is loves me; and he who loves me he will be loved by my Father, and I will love him and manifest myself to him.”
The Gospel of the Lord

songs.title: THIRTEEN SUNDAY YEAR C
songs.lyrics:
GOSPEL							 
Matthew 10:37-42
He who does not take his cross is not worthy of him. 
He who receives you, receives me.

At that time: Jesus said to his apostles, “He who loves father or mother more than me is not worthy of me; and he who loves son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me; 

and he who does not take his cross and follow me is not worthy of me. He who finds his life will lose it, and he who loses his life for my sake will find it.

 He who receives you, receives me, and he who receives me, receives him who sent me. He who receives a prophet because he is a prophet shall receive a prophet’s reward, 


and he who receives a righteous man because he is a righteous man shall receive a righteous man’s reward. 




And whoever gives to one of these little ones even a cup of little cold water because he is a disciple, truly, I say to you, shall not lose his reward.” 
The Gospel of the Lord



GOSPEL ACCLAMATION
  1 Peter 2:9
 Alleluia.
 You are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation; declare the wonderful deeds of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light.
Alleluia.

SECOND READING
						Romans 6:3-4, 8-11
Having been buried with him by baptism, let us walk in newness of life.

Brethren: All of us who have been baptized into Christ Jesus were baptized into his death. We were buried therefore with him by baptism into death, 

so that as Christ was raised from the dead by the glory of the Father, we too might walk in newness of life. But if we have died with Christ, we believe that we shall also live with him. 

For we know that Christ being raised from the dead, will never die again; death no longer has dominion over him. The death he died he died to sin, once for all, but the life he lives he lives to God. 





So you also must consider yourself dead to sin and alive to God in Christ Jesus.
The Word of the Lord.





RESPONSORIAL PSALM
		Psalms 89:2-3, 16-17, 18-19 (R. see 2a) 


R.
I will sing forever of your mercies, O Lord.



I will sing forever of your mercy, O LORD;
through all ages my mouth will proclaim your fidelity. I have declared your mercy is established forever;
your fidelity stands firm as the heavens. R



How blessed the people who know you praise,
who walk, O LORD, in the light of your face,who find their joy every day in your name,
who make your justice their joyful acclaim. R
 

 



For you are the glory of their strength;
by your favour it is that our might is exalted.
Behold, the LORD is our shield;
he is the Holy One of Israel, our king. R





FIRST READING					                        
    2 Kings 4:8-11, 14-16a
That is the holy man of God, let him remain there.

On day Elisha went on to Shunem, where a wealthy woman lived, who urged him to eat some food. So whenever he passed that way, he would turn in there to eat food. 

And she said to her husband, “Behold now, I perceive that this is a holy man of God, who is continually passing our way. Let us make a small roof chamber with walls, 

and put there for him a bed, a table, a chair, and a lamp, so that whenever he comes to us, he can go in there.” One day he came there, and he turned into the chamber and rested there. 

Gehazi
And he said to Gehazi his servant, “What is to be done for her?” Gehazi answered, “Well, she has no son and her husband is old.” He said, “Call her.” 




And when he had called her, she stood in the door way. And he said, “At this season, when the time comes round, you shall embrace a son.” 
The word of the Lord.
