songs.title: Twenty eighth.sunday year c
songs.lyrics:
FIRST READING
2 Kings 5:14-17
Naaman returned to the man of GOD and acknowledged the Lord.


In those days:
Naaman the Syrian went down and dipped himself seven times in the Jordan, according to the word of Elisha the man of God; and his flesh was restored like the flesh of a little child, and he was cleansed from his leprosy.



Then he returned to the man of God, he and all his company, and he came and stood before him; and he said, "Behold, I know that there is no God in all the earth but in Israel; so accept now a present from your servant." But he said, "As the LORD lives, whom I serve, I will receive none." And he urged him to take it, but he refused.



Then Naaman said, "If not, I beg you, let there be given to your servant two mules' burden of earth; for henceforth your servant will not offer burnt offering or sacrifice to any god but the LORD"
The word of the Lord.


SECOND READING	
2 Timothy 2:8-13
If we endure, we shall also reign with Christ 



Remember Jesus Christ, risen from the dead descended from David, as preached in my Gospel,
 other Gospel for which I am suffering 
and wearing chains like a criminal. But the word of God is not chained


Therefore I endure everything for the sake of the elect, that they also may obtain the salvation which in Christ Jesus goes with eternal glory, The saying is sure: if we have died with him, we shall also live with him; 


if we endure, we shall also reign with him; if we deny him, he also will deny us; if we are faithless, he remains faithful for he cannot deny himself. 
The word of the Lord.



GOSPEL ACCLAMATION 1Thesaloesians 5:18
Alleluia 
Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus for you
Alleluia 


GOSPEL
 Luke 17:11-19
Was no one found to return and give praise to God except 

SamariaOn the way to Jerusalem
Jesus was passing along between Samaria and Galilee.
And as he entered a village, he was met by ten lepers, who stood at a distance and lifted up their voices and said, 

"Jesus, Master, have mercy on us."
When he saw them he said to them, "Go and show yourselves to the priests." And as they went they were cleansed.
Then one of them, when he saw that he was healed, turned back, praising God with a loud voice;

 
and he fell on his face at Jesus' feet, giving him thanks. Now he was a Samaritan.
Then said Jesus,
"Were not ten cleansed?
Where are the nine?




Was no one found to return and give praise to God except this foreigner?"
And he said to him, "Rise and go your way; your faith has made you well." 
The Gospel of the Lord.


RESPONSORIAL
FIRST READING
2 Kings 5:14-17
RESPONSORIAL PSALM
                   Psalm 98:1-2 3cd-4 (R.2) 7d-9 (R. 7d. 8a)
SECOND READING
2 Timothy 2:8-13
GOSPEL ACCLAMATION
1Thesaloesians 5:18
GOSPEL: Luke 17:11-19


	RESPONSORIAL PSALM
	Psalm 98:1-2 3cd-4 (R.2)

R. 
The Lord has shown his deliverance to the nations.


O sing a new song to the LORD, for he has worked wonders. His right hand and his holy arm have brought salvation. R.



The LORD has made known his salvation, has shown his deliverance to the nations.
He has remembered his merciful love and his truth for the house of Israel. R.


 All the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
Shout to the LORD, all the earth; break forth into joyous song, and sing out your praise. R

songs.title: TWENTY-SIXTH SUNDAY(year c)
songs.lyrics:
FIRST READING
	Amos 6:1 a,4-7
 The revel"' of those who stretch themselves shall pass away.
A reading from the Book of the Prophet Amos


Thus says the LORD almighty: "Woe to those who are at ease in Zion, and to those who feel secure on the mountain of Samaria .Woe to those who lie upon beds of ivory, 


and stretch themselves upon their couches, and eat Iambs from the flock, and calves from the midst of the stall; who sing idle songs to the sound of the harp, and like David invent for themselves instruments of music; 



who drink wine in bowls, and anoint themselves with the finest oils, but are not grieved over the ruin of Joseph!
Therefore, they shall now be the first of those to go into exile, and the revelry of those who stretch themselves shall pass away." 
The word of the Lord.



RESPONSORIAL PSALM
	Psalm 146:6C-7.	8-9a.9bc-10 (R. 1b)


R.
 My soul, give praise to the Lord.


It is the Lord who preserves fidelity forever, who does justice to those who are oppressed.
It is he who gives bread to the hungry, the LORD who sets prisoners free. R.

Sion
It is the LORD who Opens the eyes of the blind, the LORD who raises up these who are bowed down.
It is the LORD who loves the just, the LORD who protects the stranger. R. 




The Lord upholds the Orphan and the widow but thwarts the path of the wicked.
The LORD will reign forever, the God of Sion from age to age. R.



SECOND READING
I Timothy 1-16 
Keep the commandment until the appearing of the Lord.


O Man of God, aim at righteousness, godliness, faith, love, steadfastness, gentleness. Fight the good fight of the faith; take hold of the eternal life to which you were called when you made the good confession in the presence of many witnesses.



In the presence of God who gives life to all things, and of Christ Jesus who in his testimony before Pontius Pilate made the good confession,
I charge you to keep the commandment unstained and free from reproach until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ;


honour
and this will be made manifest at the proper time by the blessed and only Sovereign, the King of kings and Lord of lords, who alone has immortality and dwells in unapproachable light, whom no man has ever seen or can see.
TO him be honour and eternal dominion. Amen.
The word of the Lord.


GOSPEL ACCLAMATION
ALLELUIA
	2 Corinthians 8:9
	 Though Jesus Christ was rich, yet for your sake he became poor, so that by his poverty you might become rich.
 Alleluia.

GOSPEL
 Luke 16:19-31
You in your lifetime received your good things, and Lazarus in like manner evil things; but now he is comforted here, and you are in anguish.

At that time: Jesus said to the Pharisee's,
"There was a rich man, who was clothed in purple and fine linen and who feasted sumptuously every day.


And at his gate lay a poor man named Lazarus, full of sores, who desired to be fed with what fell from the rich man 's table; moreover, the dogs came and licked his sores.



The poor man died and was carried by the angels to Abraham 's bosom. The rich man also died and was buried; and in Hades, being in torment, he lifted up his eyes, and saw Abraham far off and Lazarus in his bosom.



And he called out, 'Father Abraham, have mercy upon me, and send Lazarus to dip the end of his finger in water and cool my tongue; for I am in anguish in this flame.'



But Abraham said,
' Son, remember that you in your lifetime received your good things, and Lazarus in like manner evil things; but now he is comforted here, and you are in anguish.



And besides all this, between us and you a great chasm has been fixed, in order that those who would pass from here to you may not be able, and none may cross from there to us. '



And he said, 'Then I beg you, father, to send him to my father's house, for I have five brothers, so that he may warn them, lest they also come into this place of torment.' But Abraham said, 'They have Moses and the prophets; let them hear them.' 




And he said,
'No, father Abraham; but if someone goes to them from the dead, they will repent. ' He said to him,
'If they do not hear Moses and the prophets, neither will they be convinced if someone should rise from the dead 
The Gospel of the Lord.

songs.title: Twimbe kwa shangwe (latetest)
songs.lyrics:
Twimbe kwa shangwe na furaha *2
Bwana ametufanyia makuu*2

Aliye gizani hatajua,
Bwana ametufanyia makuu

Bwana ametufanyia makuu

Mwenye utukufu wa ajabu
Bwana ametufanyia makuu

songs.title: UBATIZO MWAKA A
songs.lyrics:
ALLELUIA
	Cf.	Mark 9:6
V. Alleluia. R. Alleluia.
V. The heavens opened and the Father’s voice was heard:
“This is my beloved Son, listen to him.”
R. Alleluia.

GOSPEL
	Matthew	3:13-17
“When Jesus was baptised the heavens were opened and the Spirit of God came upon him. ”

At that time: Jesus came from Galilee to the Jordan to John, to be baptised by him. John would have prevented him, saying, “I need to be baptised by you, and do you come to me?” 

But Jesus answered him, “Let it be so now; for thus it is fitting for us to fulfil all righteousness.” Then he consented.

And when Jesus was baptised, he went up immediately from the water, and behold, the heavens were opened and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove, and alighting on him; and behold, a voice from heaven, saying, “This is my beloved Son, with whom I am well pleased.”

SECOND READING
	Acts 10:34-38
“God anointed him with the Holy Spirit. ”

In those days: Peter opened his mouth and said, “Truly I perceive that God shows no partiality, but in every nation any one who fears him and does what is right is acceptable to him. 

You know the word which he sent to the sons of Israel, preaching good news of peace by Jesus Christ (he is Lord of all), the word which was proclaimed throughout all Judea, beginning from Galilee after the baptism which John preached: 

how God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Spirit and with power; how he went about doing good and healing all that were oppressed by the devil, for God was with him.”

RESPONSORIAL PSALM
	Psalm	29:1a	and	2.3ac-4.3b	and	9c-10 (R. 1 lb)

(R)
The Lord will bless his people with peace.

Ascribe to the Lord, you heavenly powers,ascribe to the Lord the glory of his name;bow down before the Lord,majestic in holiness.

The voice of the Lord upon the waters, the Lord on the immensity of waters; the voice of the Lord full of power; the voice of the Lord full of splendour.

The God of glory thunders; in his temple they all cry, “Glory!”
The Lord sat enthroned above the flood; the Lord sits as king forever.

THE BAPTISM OF THE LORD YEAR A

FIRST READING
	Isaiah	42:1-4.6-7
“Behold my servant, my chosen one, in whom my soul delights. ”

Thus says the Lord:Behold my servant, whom I uphold, chosen, in whom my soul delights;I 	have put my Spirit upon him,he will bring forth justice to the nations.

He will not cry or lift up his voice,or make it heard in the street;a bruised reed he will not break,and a dimly burning wick he will not quench;he will faithfully bring forth justice.

He will not fail or be discouraged till he has established justice in the earth; and the islands wait for his law.

“I am the Lord, I have called you in righteousness,I	have taken you by the hand and kept you;I 	have given you as a covenant to the people,a light to the nations,to open the eyes that are blind,to bring out the prisoners from the dungeon,from the prison those who sit in darkness.”

UBATIZO WA BWANA YESU MWAKA A

SOMO LA. KWANZA.
Isaya 42:1-4,6-7
“Huyu ndiye mtumishi wangu ninayemtegemeza, mteule wangu, moyo wangu unapendezwa naye. ”

Bwana asema hivi:“Huyu ndiye mtumishi wangu ninayemtegemeza, mteule wangu,moyo wangu unapendezwa naye.Nimeweka roho yangu juu yake;atawajulisha mataifa hukumu ya haki.

Hatalia, wala hatapaza sauti:wala hatapiga kelele katika njia za miji.Hatavunja mwanzi uliokunjika, hatazima utambi unaozimika;Bali ataleta haki kwa uaminifu.

Hatazimia wala hatakata tamaa,mpaka atakapoweka hukumu duniani,na nchi za pwani zitangojea mafundisho yake.

Mimi, Bwana, nimekuita kwa ajili ya haki, nimekushika mkono;nimekuumba, nikakuweka kuwa agano la taifa, na mwanga wa mataifa.Ili kuwafumbua vipofu macho,ili kuwaondosha vifungoni waliofungwa, na kuwaondosha gerezani wale wanaokaa gizani.”

ZABURI YA KUITIKIZANA
Zaburi 29:1a,2,3ac-4,3b,9b-10 K 11B

(K)
Bwana atawabariki watu wake kwa amani!

Mpeni Bwana, enyi wana wa Mungu, mpeni Bwana sifa na enzi; mpeni Bwana utukufu wa jina lake,mwangukieni Bwana aking’ara kwa utakatifu!

Sauti ya Bwana i juu ya maji;
Bwana ananguruma juu ya maji mengi.Sauti ya Bwana ina nguvu sana; sauti ya Bwana ni ya fahari.

Bwana wa huruma ananguruma.
Hekaluni mwake wote husema, “Utukufu!”Bwana ameketi kama mfalme juu ya gharika!Bwana ametawazwa kama mfalme wa milele!

SOMO 2
Matendo ya Mitume 10:34-38
“Mungu alimpaka mafuta Yesu kwa Roho Mtakatifu. ”

Siku zile: Petro alifumbua kinywa, akasema, “Hakika, sasa nimeng’amua ya kuwa Mungu hana ubaguzi. Bali, katika kila taifa, mtu yeyote mwenye kumcha yeye na kutenda yaliyo haki hukubaliwa naye. 

Mungu aliwapelekea wana wa Israeli neno lake, tena ni hao walioletewa na Yesu Kristo habari njema ya amani, ni huyu Yesu Kristo aliye Bwana wa wote. 

Mmejua yaliyotukia katika Uyahudi wote kuanzia Galilaya baada ya ubatizo aliouhubiri Yohane, jinsi Mungu alivyompaka mafuta Yesu wa Nazareti kwa Roho Mtakatifu na nguvu.

Na jinsi alivyozunguka katika nchi yote akitenda mema na kuwaponya wote walioonewa na Shetani, kwa maana Mungu alikuwa pamoja naye.”

SHANGILIO LA INJILI
Marko 9:7
Aleluya. w Aleluya.
Wingu lilitokea,
na sauti ya Baba ikatokea mbinguni ikisema, Huyu ni Mwanangu mpendwa, msikilizeni yeye. 
Aleluya.

INJILI
Mathayo 3:13-17
“Baada ya kubatizwa, Yesu alimwona Roho wa Mungu akimshukia. ”

Wakati ule: Yesu alitoka Galilaya, akafika Yordani kwa Yohane abatizwe naye. Lakini Yohane alitaka kumzuia akisema, “Mim: nahitaji kubatizwa na wewe, nawe unakuja kwangu?”

Yesu akajibu, akamwambia, “Acha iwe hivyo kwa sasa, kwa maana ndivyo yatupasa kutimiza haki yote.” Akamkubalia alivyosema.Baada ya kubatizwa, Yesu akatoka mara majini.

Na tazama, mbingu zikafunguka.Akamwona Roho wa Mungu akimshukia kwa mfano wa njiwa. Tazama, pale pale sauti ikatoka mbinguni ikisema,“Huyu ni Mwanangu mpendwa, anipendezaye.”

songs.title: UBATIZO MWAKA C
songs.lyrics:
SOMO LA KWANZA
	Isaya 40:1-5,9-11
"Utukufu wa Bwana utafunuliwa, na watu wote watauona mara.  

Watulizeni, wapeni tulizo watu wangu, asema Mungu wenu.
Semeni na moyo wa Yerusalemu, utangazieni ya kwamba:
huduma yake ngumu imekwisha, dhambi yake imeondolewa, maana kwa mkono wa Bwana amepokea adhabu maradufu kwa maovu yake yote.

 Mtu analia:
tengenezeni jangwani njia ya Bwana!
Nyosheni nyikani barabara kwa Mungu wetu!
Kila bonde lifukiwe, kila mlima na kilima kishushwe,
Njia zenye kupotoka zinyoshwe, na njia zenye mashimo zisawazishwe.


Hapo utukufu wa Bwana utafunuliwa, na watu wote watauona mara; maana kinywa cha Bwana kimenena haya.
Panda juu ya mlima mrefu, uutangaziye Sioni habari njema!
Paza sauti kwa nguvu, 

uutangaziye Yerusalemu habari njema! Paza sauti, usiogope!
Sema kwa miji ya Yuda:
Tazama, Mungu wenu!
tuzo ya ushindi wake litamsindikiza, mateka yake yatamtangulia.


Kama mchungaji, atachunga kundi lake; mkononi mwake atawakusanya wanakondoo, atawachukua kifuani mwake, atawaongoza kondoo wenye kunyonyesha. 
Neno la Bwana.



ZABURI YA KUITIKIZANA
Zaburi 104: 1b-2, 3-4,24 -25, 27-28,29-30 (K. 1) 

K. 
Umsifu Bwana, ee roho yangu!

Ee Bwana, Mungu wangu u mkuu sana!
Umejivika fahari na adhama, umejivika mwanga kama vazi.
Umetandaza anga kama hema. K.

Umeweka nguzo za ghorofa zake juu ya maji.
Umefanya mawingu kuwa gari lako, umekwenda juu ya mbawa za upepo.
Umefanya pepo kuwa wajumbe wako, na ndimi za moto, kuwa watumishi wako. K.


Ee Bwana, jinsi gani zilivyo nyingi kazi zako!
Zote umezifanya kwa hekima, dunia imejaa viumbe vyako.
Bahari iko kule, kubwa na pana sana!
Ndimo mlimo viendavyo bila idadi, viumbe hai vidogo na vikubwa. K.

Hao wote hukutazamia wewe uwape chakula chao kwa wakati wake.
Wewe huwapa, nao wanakiokota; wewe unakunjua mkono wako, nao wanashiba mema. K.





Ukiuficha uso wako, wanafadhaika.
Ukiondoa pumzi yao ,wanakufa
na kuyarudia mavumbi yao.
Ukiipclcka roho yako wanaumbwa, na unafanya upya uso wa nchi. K.





SOMO LA PILI
"Bwana alituokoa kwa huruma yake akituosha tupate kuzaliwa tena na kutengenezwa upya na Roho Mtakatifu.
Somo katika barua ya Mtakatifu Paulo kwa Tito

Mpcndwa:
Neema ya Mungu imetokea kwa kuwaokoa watu wote, nayo inatuongoza kuzuia yasiyo ya Mungu, na kupinga tamaa za kidunia, tupate kuishi duniani hapa kwa kiasi, kwa haki na kwa uchaji wa Mungu, tukingoja heri tunayoitazamia, 

na ufunuo wa utukufu wa Mungu mkuu na wa Mwokozi wetu Yesu Kristo.
Yeye amejitoa mwenyewe kwa ajili yetu, ili atukomboe katika uovu wote, na ajitakasie watu walio mali yake ya pekee na wenye bidii kutenda mema.


Lakini wema wa Mwokozi wetu Mungu na hisani yake kwa wanadamu zilipotokea, ametuokoa, lakini si kwa sababu ya matendo maadilifu tuliyoyatenda sisi, isipokuwa kwa huruma yake akituosha tupate kuzaliwa tena na kutengenezwa upya na Roho Mtakatifu

.Mungu ametumwagia huyo ndani yetu kwa wingi kwa ajili ya Yesu Kristo, Mwokozi wetu, tupate kuthibitishwa kwa neema yake, na hivyo kufanywa warithi wa uzima wa milele tunaotumaini.
Neno Ia Bwana.




SHANGILIO LA INJILI
	Tazama Luka 3: 16
	 Aleluya
Yohane alisema:
Anakuja mmoja aliye na nguvu kuliko mimi.
Yeye atawabatiza kwa Roho Mtakatifu na kwa moto. 
 Aleluya

INJILI
Luka 3:15-16,21-24	
Baada ya Yesu kubatizwa alipokuwa katika kusali, mbing zilifunguka.

Wakati ule:
Watu walishikwa na udadisi, wote wakajiuliza mioyoni mwao kama huyu Yohane ni Masiya mwenyewe au sivyo.
Yohane akawapa wote jibu lake akisema,

 "Mimi nawabatiza kwa maji tu, lakini anakuja mmoja aliye na nguvu kuliko mimi.
Hata sistahili kufungua ukanda wa viatu vyake.
Yeye atawabatiza kwa Roho Mtakatifu na kwa moto.

" Baada ya watu wote kubatizwa na Yesu pia kubatizwa, alipokuwa katika kusali, mbingu zilifunguka na Roho Mtakatifl akamshukia katika umbo la kiwiliwili, mfano wa njiwa.
Tena sauti ikatoka mbinguni ikinena,
"Wewe ndiwe Mwanangu mpendwa, nimependezwa nawe•"

Injili ya Bwana.

songs.title: UBATIZO WA BWANA.2021
songs.lyrics:
SOMO LA KWANZA
Isaya 55:1-11
"Njooni penye maji:
sikilizeni, na roho zenu zitaishi. 

Bwana asema hivi:
"Enyi wote wenye kiu, njoni penye maji! Hata msipokuwa na fedha, njoni:
njoni mnunue nafaka na kula; njoni mnywe divai na maziwa, 


bila fedha na bila kulipa!
Kwa nini mnatoa fedha mpate kitu kisicho mkate, kwa nini mnachoka mpate kitu kisichoshibisha?
Nisikilizeni mimi, mtakula vitamu, na kufurahishwa kwa vyakula vitamu.


Tegeni sikio, njoni kwangu; sikilizeni, na roho zenu zitaishi.
Nitafanya nanyi agano la milele, nitasimika wema wa milele niliyomwahidia Daudi.
Angalicni, nimemweka awe shahidi kwa makabila, kiongozi na mtawala wa mataifa.




Tazama, utaliita taifa usilolijua, na taifa lisilokujua litakukimbilia, kwa sababu ya BWANA, Mungu wako, na ya Mtakatifu wa Israeli aliyekukuza.
Mtafuteni BWANA akiwa anapatikana bado, mwiteni angali yupo karibu.




Mtu mbaya aache njia yake, naye mwovu aache mawazo yake; amrudic BWANA atakayemhurumia;
Mungu wetu anayesamehe kabisa.

Maana mawazo yangu si mawazo ycnu.
wala njia zangu si njia zenu, asema BWANA Kama vile mbingu ziinukavyo juu ya nchi,


 ndivyo njia zangu ni juu kuliko njia zenu, na mawazo yangu juu kuliko mawazo yenu.
Kama vile mvua na theluji zishukavyo kutoka mbinguni, wala hazirudi huko bila kuinywesha ardhi, 

na na kuichipusha, ikampa mtu apandaye mbegu. na mtu alaye chakula, ndivyo litakkuizalisha avyokuwa neno langu. 



litokalo katika kinywa changu; halitanirudia bure, bali litatimiza mapenzi yangu, nalo litafanikiwa katika mambo yale niliyolituma."
Neno la Bwana.



SOMO LA PILI 
      1 Yohane 5:1-9
     "Roho na maji na damu."


Wapendwa:
Kila asadikiye ya kuwa Yesu ni Kristo, ana asili yake katika Mungu.
Na kila ampendayc Baba, ampenda pia aliyezaliwa naye.


Tutakuwa na hakika kwamba tunawapenda watoto wa Mungu, tukimpenda Mungu mwenyewe na kuzishika amri zake. Maana kumpenda Mungu ni kuzishika amri zake, na amri zăke si nzito.



Kwa maana yote yalîyo na asili yake katika Mungu huushinda ulimwengu.
Na ushindi ushindao ulimwengu ndiyo imani yetu. Ni nani awezaye kuushinda ulimwengu isipăwa yeye tu asadikiye ya kuwa Yesu ni Mwana Wa Mungu? 



Ni Yesu Kristo aliyekuja kwa njia ya maji na damu na Roho.Hakuja katika maji tu, bali katika maji na damu Pia.
Ndiye Roho ashuhudiaye, kwa maana Roho ni ukweli.
Basi, kuna watatu wanaoshuhudia:



Roho, na maji, na damu; hao watatu hushuhudia neno moja. Ikiwa tunapokea ushuhuda wa wanadamu, basi ushuhuda wa Mungu ni mkubwa zaidi.
Ushuhuda wa Mungu ndio huu: amemshuhudia Mwanawe.
Neno la Bwana.



ZABURJ YA KUITIKIZANA
	Isaya 12:2-3,4bcd,5-6(k3)	4


K
 Kwa furaha mtateka maji kwenye chemehemi za wokovu.


Ndiye Mungu wa wokovu wangu; namtumainia, wala Sina hofu tena.
Kwa kuwa Bwana ni nguvu yangu na wimbo wangu, amekuwa wokovu wangu.
Nanyi mtateka maji kwa furaha kwenye chemchemi za wokovu. K.

Mshukuruni Bwana, liiteni jina lake; tangazeni kati ya mataifa matendo yake makuu, wakumbusheni ya kuwa jina lake ni tukufu sana. K.



Mwimbieni Bwana, maana ametenda miujiza; itangazwe duniani kote.
Paza sauti za furaha na shangwe, enyi watu wa Sioni.
maana ametukuzwa ndani yako, Mtakatifu wa Israeli! K.



SHANGILIO LA INJILI
	Tazama Yohane 1:29
Aleluya.	Aleluya.
   Yohane alimwona Yesu anakuja kwake, akasema, "Tazameni, Mwanakondoo wa Mungu aondoaye dhambi za ulimwengu.”
Aleluya.



INJILI
Marko 1:7-11
" Wewe ni Mwanangu mpendwa;
"ninayependeawa nawe. "

Wakati ule: Yohane alihubiri akisema,
"Anayekuja baada yangu ni mwenye nguvu kunipita mimi.
Kwake sifai hata kuinama na kufungua gidamu ya viatu vyake.


Mimi nimewabatiza kwa maji; lakini yeye atawabatiza kwa Roho Mtakatifu."
Ikatokea siku zile kuwa Yesu alikuja kutoka Nazareti katika Galilaya, akabatizwa na Yohane katika Yordani.



 Mara alipotoka kwenye maji, aliona mbingu zinapasuka na Roho akimshukia mfano wa njiwa.
Na sauti ikatoka mbinguni, ikisema,
''Wewe ni Mwanangu mpendwa; ninayependezwa naye."
Injili ya Bwana.

songs.title: UJE ROHO MTAKATIFU TUANGAZE  (SEKWENSIA)2022
songs.lyrics:
UJE ROHO MTAKATIFU TUANGAZE(SEKWENSEA)

1.uje Roho Mtakatifu,tuangaze toka mbingu Roho zetu kwa mwangao

2.Uje Baba wa maskini,uje mtoa wa vipaji uje mwanga wa mioyo

3.Ee Mfariji mwema sana,ee Rafiki mwanana Ewe raha mustarehe

4.Kwenye kazi u pumziko,kwenye joto,burudiko u mfutaji wa machozi

5.Ewe mwanga wenye heri,uwajaze waamini Neema yako mioyoni

6.Bila nguvu yakow ewe,mwanadamu hana kitu kwake yote yana kosa



7.Osha machafuko yetu,panyeshee pakavu petu Na kuponya majeraha

8.Ulegeze ukaidi,washa moto wa uadili Nyoosha upotevu wote



9.wape waumini wako ,wenye tumaini kwako paji zako zote saba 


10.Wape tuzo ya fadhila wape mwisho bila hila Wape heri milele

songs.title: Unihurumie mimi  MANENO YA WIMBO
songs.lyrics:
Maneno ya wimbo
.

Unihurumie mimi Bwana, nimetenda dhambi mimi Bwana, ninakusihi, ee Mungu wangu, unisamehe, makosa yangu, ( niliyokutendea wewe Mungu wangu na jirani zangu ) x 2

1.Dhambi zimenitenga nawe, Bwana unihurumie, mimi ni mkosefu.

2.	Nauogopa uso wako, kwani nimekosa Baba, unihurumie.

3.	Ewe Baba mwenye huruma, unihurumie mimi, nimetenda dhambi.


4.	Uisafishe roho yangu, uniimarishe Bwana, nisitende dhambi

songs.lyrics:
UNIONDOLEE DHAMBI


Uniondolee dhambi nitakase,
Unioshe niwe mweupe pe x2


1.Nakiri makosa yangu, naziona dhambi zangu Unioshe niwe mweupe


2.Kweli mimi mkosefu, tangu kuzaliwa kwangu mwenye dhambi tangu tumboni mwa mamangu

4.Wewe wataka unyofu, ule unyofu wa ndani Nifundishe hekima moyoni


5.Niumbie moyo safi, na uweke ndani yangu  Roho mpya iliyo dhabiti

songs.title: Utambi mchafu
songs.lyrics:
MWANZI ULIOPONDEKA


1.Utambi mchafu wa moshi mzito Hata uzima kadhalika mwanzi Uliopondeka kamwe hata uvunja


Hatanitupa bwana yesu (milele yote) atanipigania 
Hataniacha bwana yesu (niangamie) atanipigania


2.Najua mtetesi wangu ni mwema Mwenye huruma mwingi wa rehema Asiye yahesabu maovu ya watu


3.Nakiri mimi mdhaifu kabisa Nimeanguka kulitii neno Lakini ni tamuangukia mwenyezi


4.Nanyi ndugu zangu kweenu Na tubu niliyofanya si kuwapendeza Nisamehe nichukulie ni pia


5.Sikati tamaa kwa kuwa najua Yesu Mwokozi amenisamehe Kwa kuwa hiyo ndio tabia ya yesu

songs.title: UTATU MTAKATIFU (MWAKA C)
songs.lyrics:
SOMO LA KWANZA
Mithali 8:22-31 
"Kabla ya dunia kuwapo, nilikuwa nimezaliwa. "

Hekima ya Mungu asema hivi: Bwana ameniumba tangu mwanzo wa njia zake, malimbuko ya kazi zake alizofanya tangu asili; tangu wakati wa kale nimeumbwa, tangu mwanzo, kabla ya dunia kuwapo.

. Kabla vilindi havijakuwapo, nalizaliwa, kabla ya chemchemi zenye kujaa maji; kabla milima haijawekwa imara, na kabla ya vilima, nilikuwa nimezaliwa; kabla Mungu hajaumba nchi wala mashamba, wala udongo wa kwanza wa dunia.

Alipoziweka mbingu, nilikuwapo, alipopiga mstari kuzungukia bahari kuu; alipoweka imara mawingu mahali pa juu, na kukaza chemchemi za bahari mahali pake, alipoiwekea bahari mipaka yake, yaani maji yasipite ukingo wake;




aliposimika misingi ya dunia, hapo nilikuwa kama fundi wa kazi pamoja naye; siku kwa siku nikawa furaha yake, nikicheza mbele yake wakati wote. Nikicheza juu ya uso wa dunia yake, na furaha yangu kuwa pamoja na wanadamu.
Neno la Bwana.




SHANGILIO LA INJILI
	Tazama Ufunuo 1:8
	 Aleluya.
 Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu. Mungu aliyeko, aliyekuwako na anayekuja.
 Aleluya.

ZABURI YA KUITIKIZANA
	Zaburi 8:4-5, 6-7, 8-9 (K. 2a)

K. 
Ee Bwana, jinsi lilivyo tukufu jina lako duniani kote!


Nikiziangalia mbingu zako, kazi ya vidole vyako,
mwezi na nyota ulizozipangilia
mtu ni kitu gani hata umkumbuke
na mwandamu ni nini hata umjali? K.


Umemfanya mdogo kidogo chini ya mungu,
Umemvika taji la utukufu na heshima.
Umempa mamlaka juu ya kazi za mikono yako.
Umeviweka vitu vyote chini ya miguu yake. K. 



Kondoo na ng’ombe wote,  hata wanyama wa porini,
ndege wa angani, na samaki wa baharini,
kila kiumbe kitembeacho njia za baharini.K.



	SOMO LA PILI
	Warumi 5:1—5
"Twende kwa Mungu, kwa njia ya Kristo, katika upendo ulioenezwa kupitia Roho Mtakatifu.

Ndugu zangu: Kwa kuwa tumekubaliwa uadilifu kwa nguvu ya imani, tuna amani na Mungu kwa njia ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo. Katika imani, huyo ametuwezesha kuingia hali ya neema tuliyo nayo sasa.

Kwa sababu ya neema hiyo twafurahia matumaini ya kushiriki utukufu wa Mungu. Lakini hatufurahii hayo tu, bali twafurahia vile vile mateso. Maana twajua kwamba mateso huleta subira; subira huleta uthabiti,



 
na uthabiti huleta matumaini. Lakini matumaini hayadanganyi, kwa maana upendo wa Mungu umeenezwa mioyoni mwetu na Roho Mtakatifu tuliyempokea.
Neno la Bwana.




INJILI
	Yohane 16:12-15
"Yote Baba aliyo nayo ni yangu.
Roho atatwaa katika yale yaliyo yangu na kuwatangazia ninyi. " 

Wakati ule: Yesu aliwaambia wafuasi wake: “Ninayo bado mengi ya kuwaambia, lakini sasa hamwezi kuyavumilia bado. Lakini atakapokuja yeye, Roho wa ukweli, atawaongoza katika ukweli wote.

Kwa maana hatasema yake mwenyewe, ila atakayoyasikia atayasema na kuwatangazia ninyi mambo yajayo. Yeye atanitukuza, kwa maana atatwaa katika yale yaliyo yangu na kuwatangazia ninyi.




Yote Baba aliyo nayo ni yangu; kwa hiyo nalisema ya kwamba atatwaa katika yale yaliyo yangu na kuwatangazia ninyi.” Injili ya Bwana.

songs.title: UTATU MTAKATIFU MWAKA B
songs.lyrics:
ZABURI YA KUITIKIZANA 
Zaburi 33:4-5, 6 na 9, 18-19,20 na 22 (K. 12b) 

K.
 Heri taifa ambalo Bwana amelichagua kuwa urithi wake.



Neno la Bwana ni la kweli; matendo yake yote ni maaminifu.
Bwana apenda unyofu na haki dunia imejaa wema wake. K.



Mbingu zimefanywa kwa neno la Bwana; na jeshi lake lote kwa pumzi ya kinywa chake.
Maana yeye alisema, vikawa, yeye aliamuru, vikasimama. K.

Lakini macho ya Bwana yawaelekea wale wamchao, wale wanaotumainia wema wake, ili aiopoe roho yao katika kifo, na wakati wa njaa awalishe. K.


Nafsi zetu zinamngoja Bwana,yeye ndiye msaada wetu na ngao yetu.Fadhili zako zikae nasi, ee Bwana; kama vile tunavyokutumainia wewe. K.


SOMO LA PILI 
	Warumi 8:14-17
"Mmempokea Roho anayewafanya kuwa wana wa Mungu na kuita, "Abba! Baba!”

Ndugu zangu:
Wote wanaoongozwa na Roho wa Mungu ni wana wa Mungu. Kwa maana hamkupata roho ya utumwa mwogope tena, bali mmempokea Roho anayewafanya kuwa wana wa Mungu na kuita, 


"Abba! Baba!" Roho mwenyewe hushuhudia roho zetu ya kuwa Sisi ni watoto wa Mungu. Basi, tukiwa wana, tu warithi pia, 



yaani warithi wa Mungu wanaorithi pamoja na Kristo, tukiwa tunavumilia mateso pamoja na Kristo, tupate kutukuzwa pamoja naye.
Neno la Bwana



SOM0 LA KWANZA 
  Torati 4:32-34,39-40
"Bwana aliye Mungu huko juu mbinguni sawa  kama chini hapa duniani, yeye peke yake wala hakuna mwingine yeyote"

Musa alinena na watu, akisema, "Uliza nyakati za kale zilizopita toka siku ile Mungu alipomwumba mtu duniani; toka upande mmoja wa mbinguni hata upande mwingine: Je, kumetukia neno kubwa kama hilo? Je, kumesikika neno kama hilo? 


Je, kumekuwapo taifa lililosikia sauti ya Mungu mzima asemaye kati ya moto kama ulivyosikia wewe, na kubaki mzima? Au Mungu gani aliyejitafutia taifa kati ya mataifa mengine,



 kwa majaribu, kwa maajabu na miujiza, na kwa vita, kwa mkono wa nguvu na mkono ulionyoshwa sawa, na kwa vitisho vikubwa, yote matendo ambayo Bwana Mungu wako ameyatenda huko Misri machoni mwako?



Fahamu basi leo hivi, na fikiri moyoni mwako kwamba ndiye
BWANA aliye Mungu huko juu mbinguni sawa kama chini hapa duniani, yeye peke yake wala hakuna mwingine yeyote. 

Zishike sheria zake na amri zake ninazokuamuru leo hivi, ili mpate heri Wewe na wanao, muwe na heri na maisha marefu katika nchi akupayo Bwana Mungu wako kwa siku zote."
Neno la Bwana

INJILI
	Mathayo 28:16-20 
     "Mwabatize kwajina la Baba na la Mwana na la Roho Mtakatifu.


Wakati ule:
Wafuasi kumi na mmoja walienda Galilaya kwenye mlima aliowaagiza Yesu. Walipomwona, walimwabudu, lakini baadhi Yao waliona mashaka. Yesu akakaribia, akawaambia,


Nimepewa mamlaka yote mbinguni na duniani. Basi, nendeni, mkayafanye mataifa yote kuwa wafuasi mkiwabatiza kwa jina la Baba, na la Mwana, na la Roho Mtakatifu.



Mkawafundishe kushika yote niliyowaagiza.
Na tazama, nipo pamoja nanyi siku zote mpaka mwisho wa dahari.'
Injili ya Bwana



SHANGILIO LA INJILI
	Tazama Ufunuo 1:8
Aleluya.	Aleluya.
       Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu. Mungu aliyeko, aliyekuwako na anayekuja”
Aleluya.

songs.lyrics:

Mpeni kaisari, yaliyo yake

Shughuli zetu sisi kuingia kwenye baa
Ikiwa zitabaki, twakuja kanisani Twamtolea Mungu, shilingi moja na tano

Ujenzi wa kanisa, twalazimishwa kutoa.


5.Kumbuka Ibrahimu, alitoa mwanawe
Kama sadaka kwake Mungu Baba wa mbinguni Na sisi kwa furaha, tupeleke zawadi
Itakayopendeza, kama ile ya Abeli

Amewaandalia (Leo) karamu takatifu (Njooni) mwili na damu yake chakula safi cha roho x 2


verse 4
Tusipokula mwili na kunywa damu yake,tunazinyima roho, zetu neema zake Bwana


chorus
Wateule wa Bwana karibuni mezani Pake (njooni) Bwana awaalika enyi wenye moyo safi x 2
Amewaandalia (Leo) karamu takatifu (Njooni) mwili na damu yake chakula safi cha roho x 2

songs.title: watu imbeni
songs.lyrics:
watu imbeni, watu imbine pasa sauti zenu imbeni malaika. malaika malaika nanyi sifuni malaika malaika wa mbinguni 

sifuni tumwimbie Mungu wetu tumshangilie. 

1. Njoni na tarumbeta, njuga na vinanda.

2. Anga ishangilie nchi irukeruke.

3. Enzi zimwadhimishe zama zimhubiri.

4. Yeye amezipata sifa tumpambazo.

songs.title: Watu imbeni  paza sauti zenu
songs.lyrics:
Watu imbeni x2 paza sauti zenu imbeni
Malaika,malaika nanyi sifuni, malaika malaika mbinguni sifuni tumwimbie Mungu wetu tumshangilie.


1. Njoni na tarumbeta njuga na vinanda

2. Anga ishangilie nchi irukeruke

3. Enzi zimwadhimishe zama zimhubiri

4. Yeye amezipata sifa tumpambazo

songs.title: waumini tutoe sadaka
songs.lyrics:
waumini tutoe sadaka tulivyo sadaka tulivyo
navyo tutoeni,tumtolee kwa ukarimu mungu mungu
wetu atubariki inuka utoe sadaka kwa bwana kwa
mema yake yote X2


1. Tutoe sadaka kwake yote bwana kwa ukarimu tujiwekee
  uzima yetu mbinguni
 

 2. Kutoa si mali yako wewe mbali ni moyo toeni kwa 
  bwana naye atawabariki

  3. Ametujalia afya njema bila malipo kwa upendo wake
  kwetu sisi tumtolee

songs.title: We Asa osa nthembo
songs.lyrics:
{ We Asa osa nthembo yaitu,
We Asa osa na uituathima } *2

1( Na Mukate wumite nganuni ya nthi
We Asa osa na uituathima } *2

2. Na ndivai yumite nzavivuni ya nthi
We Asa osa na uituathima

3.Na mbesa syumite mivukoni ya nthi
We Asa osa na uituathima


4.Na ngetha yumite miundani ya nthi
We Asa osa na uituathima








5.Na malondu maumite ndithyani yitu
ya nthi
We Asa osa na uituathima

songs.title: WE NDUKAHUNIE GUOKO
songs.lyrics:
WE NDUKAHUNIE GUOKO


1.We  ndukahunie  guoko riria ugucokia ngatho; Ngai  we  ndakuheire o kingotore; Ni  manoti matheri ;ni mburi na ni ng'ombe; Ni Kahua, macani na indo ingi.


Ruta muhothi  waku Ciana cione ndathimi,Aciari na arata  marathimwo( Biacara yaku) nayo  irathimwo Ihote  guthererema. Tanahira Ngai uria wakuheire.(Ndukahunie   guoko)


2.Ti kumuhe  ukumuhe ni guoko  ugucokia' Na niundu wa indo ciothe iria akuhete.Wakariha na ciene ,ko ni ciaku ungika atia? Kenia Ngai na ngatho  yaku.



 3.Ugoti wa Gaithari Mwathani ekuga urute  n'omenye  urute  ugoti,ii wa Mwathani. Kanitha ni muhothi wee nawe  ukirungii  ha?, Ta kirute kanitha yakike



4.Iga muthithu waku bengi-'ni ya Mwathani Niguo Kanitha  yake  igithereme, Niaribaragirira kinya  ugakinya  gwake. Uguo-ta-iga bengi-ni yake.

songs.title: WE THREE KINGS
songs.lyrics:
We three kings of orient are
Bearing gifts we traverse afar
Field and fountain
Moor and mountain
Following yonder star



O star of wonder, star of night
Star with royal beauty bright
Westward leading, still proceeding
Guide us to thy perfect light


Born a King on Bethlehem's plain
Gold I bring to crown Him again
King for ever, ceasing never
Over us all to reign


Frankincense to offer have I
Incense owns a Deity nigh
Prayer and praising, all men raising
Worship Him, God most high




Glorious now behold Him arise
King and God and Sacrifice!
Al-le-lu-ia, al-le-lu-ia
Heaven to earth replies

songs.title: WIMUKUMIE WEE MWATHANI
songs.lyrics:
WIMUKUMIE WEE MWATHANI


Wimukumie wee Mwathani ,Ngai wa thin na waiguru, niundu wotana waku? nitwamukirite matege  maya  twarehe X2





1.  Mugate hamwe na njohi-nitwagutegera Mwathani Maciaro ma migunda itu - twagikuria umamukire




2.Magetha ohamwe na mbecea- ni thithino ya moko maitu 

3.Mahiu ona migunda itu -ona mawira maitu mothe

4 Ikeno na mathina maitu- Mahoya matarania maitu 





5. Bururi atongoria aitu- Micii itu aturi akuo

songs.title: Yatosha sasa
songs.lyrics:
Yatosha sasa mahangaiko haya, yatosha, mapigo ni mengi mno. Yatosha sasa mateso makali haya, yatosha kabisa, yatosha mno. 

1. Ee Mungu tazama chozi langu, sikiliza kilio changu. Narudi kwako mara nyingine, kulilia huruma yako. 

2. Natamani nami nipumzike, Ee Mungu chukua hatua. Kwa nini unanyamaza kimya, naita mpaka nazimia? 

3. Siwezi, siwezi ee Mungu; Mizigo yanielemea. 

4. Upendo wako Mungu, nitautumainia bila kuchoka. 

5. Huruma yako Mungu, ni huruma ya milele. Huruma yako Mungu, nitakufa nikiitumainia.

songs.title: YESU AKALIA
songs.lyrics:
YESU AKALIA


Yesu akalia sauti kuu (akasema)baba mikononi mwako naiweka roho yanguX2

  1.Alipo kwisha kusema hayo,akakata roho yule akida alipoona hayo akasema huyu hakika alikuwa mwana wa mungu.

2.	Na makutano yote ya watu walohudhulia wakafadhaika wakaenda zao waliomba akapigapiga vifua kuomba



3.Na wote waliojuana naye,waloadamana na walomfuata toka galilaya kwa Pamoja  wakasimama Wakitazama mambo hayo

songs.title: Yesu Asante sana
songs.lyrics:
Yesu Asante sana
Yesu asante sana x 2
Kujifanya chakula x 2
Kutuletea shibe alama ya pendo x 2


Wewe ndiwe chetu chakula uzima umetushibisha Yesu asante


Yesu Asante sana
Yesu asante sana x 2
Kujifanya chakula x 2
Kutuletea shibe alama ya pendo x 2


Kila tunapokula mkate huu tunapata uzima wa milele


Yesu Asante sana
Yesu asante sana x 2
Kujifanya chakula x 2
Kutuletea shibe alama ya pendo x 2


Kila tunapokunywa kikombe hiki tunapata uzima wa milele.


Yesu Asante sana
Yesu asante sana x 2
Kujifanya chakula x 2
Kutuletea shibe alama ya pendo x 2


Twashukuru ee Yesu kwa wema wako. Umetushibisha yesu asante.


Yesu Asante sana
Yesu asante sana x 2
Kujifanya chakula x 2
Kutuletea shibe alama ya pendo x 2

songs.title: YESU ATUALIKA(WAITHAKA)
songs.lyrics:
YESU ATUALIKA


	 Yesu atualika(	W)Yesu atualika mezani
    Twendeni kumpokea (W) Twendeni kumpokea kwa Shangwe

1. Anatugawia chakula cha mbinguni Yesu.


2.	Anatushibisha kwa chakula bora Yesu

3.	Atuburudisha kwa kinywaji safi Yesu



4.	Tuwe na imani ili tuweze pata uzima.

songs.title: Yesu kristu ni mfalme
songs.lyrics:
Yesu kristu ni mfalme ni mfalme wa wafalme ni bwana wa mabwana utawala wake si wa dunia hii(bali) utawala wake ni wa mbinguni




1.Utawala wake yesu unjgekuwa ni wa dunia hii (kweli) hakika angekua jeshi lake la kumlinda

2.Utawala wake yesu ungekuwa ni wa dunia hii (kweli) hakika ingekuwa na serikali ya kuiongoza 
 



3.Utawala  wake yesu unjgekuwa ni wa dunia hii (kweli)kamwe asingekufa kwa ajili yetu sisi wanadamu

songs.title: Yesu Mwema najitolea
songs.lyrics:
Yesu Mwema


Verse 1
Yesu Mwema najitolea kwako kwa leo hii na siku zote
Nafsi yangu na moyo wangu wote (heri kweli)x 3 Raha ya uwingu


Verse 2
Ndani yangu umekuja daima kuwa nami ni pendo lako ewe mpenzi mwenye utamu mwingi ( ni Mapendo) x 3 ya moyo wako


Verse 4 
Nitaweza kukurundishia nini kwa wema huu wa pendo lako Roho yangu ume ifadhili (nikupende)x 2 kukupenda ni tama yangu.





 weka rabi katika roho yangu wema wako na unyenyekevu
Na upendo kuu fadhili ya imani (niongoze) x3 katika imani

songs.title: YESU NAKUTAMANI
songs.lyrics:
Yesu Nakuhitaji


Yesu wangu nakutamani nakutamani Yesu wangu nakutamani rohoni mwangu kweli
Yesu wangu nakuhitaji nakuhitaji Yesu wangu nakuhitaji maishani mwangu
Ni wewe ni wewe tegemeo langu ni wewe ni wewe kimbilio langu ni wewe ni wewe mwokozi wangu wa Roho yangu x2

1. (a) Nakukaribisha Yesu moyoni mwangu, ingia moyoni mwangu unipe raha.
    (b) Kaa nami-ndani yangu nami ndani yako,ingia moyoni mwangu unipe raha.



2. (a) Nathubutu kuringia uwepo wako, ingia moyoni mwangu unipe raha.
    (b) Nahisi furaha moyoni ni-kiwa nawe, ingia moyoni mwangu unipe raha.

songs.title: YESU NI UZIMA WANGU WAITHAKA
songs.lyrics:
YESU NI UZIMA WANGU

(Ee Yesu wewe ni uzima wangu, kiongozi bora wa maisha yangu, nilapo mwili wako na kunywa damu yako, naupata uzima wa milele) x2

1.	Nishibishe kwa mwili wako yesu, nipate wokovu wa maisha yangu 

2.	Uninyweshe kwa  damu yako ee ye-su, niurithi  uzima wa milele

3.	Ee bwana ingia moyoni mwangu, uwe wangu nami  kweli niwe wako.

4.	Ee yesu tawala maisha yangu, nihubiri neno lako siku zote.

songs.title: Yuda akarudi
songs.lyrics:
Yuda akarudi, chukua fedha zenu huyu ni mwema,
Pilato akakiri hana kosa lakini kamuueni,
Kainuliwa mtupu na kajeruhiwa sana,
Amekata roho, nchi inazizima kwa huzuni kuu.
Ona damu, mwili umelowana


1 Ona nyama, madonda mwili mzima

Moyo wake, nao umetoboka.

Mate yao, yamemfunika uso.

2 Meno yake, kang'ata kwa uchungu.

Nafsi yangu, imemjeruhi Yesu

Dhambi zangu, zikamchomoa roho

Mungu wangu, nionjeshe uchungu

3 Ili nife, pamoja naye Kristu

Mwisho nije, nikafufuke naye

songs.title: Yumo humu mwokozi
songs.lyrics:
Yumo humu mwokozi.


verse 1
Yumo humu mwokozi Yesu kwenye
Mzabibu na ngano tamu ni mpole ni mwema ni uzima.


chorus
Waumini simameni, polepole kwa maringo njongeeni karamuni mpate kumwonja mwokozi Yesu.


verse 2
Ekaristi ni Jina lake pamoja nasi Mungu mwenyewe ndani yetu nasi ndani yake


chorus
Waumini simameni, polepole kwa maringo njongeeni karamuni mpate kumwonja mwokozi Yesu


verse 3
Alitoa njioni ili, kwa kumbukumbu yake milele, tule tunywe wote tuokoke.


chorus
Waumini simameni, polepole kwa maringo njongeeni karamuni mpate kumwonja mwokozi Yesu


verse 4
Tugeuze maisha yetu yakafanana na meza hii huruma upendo na msamaha.


chorus
Waumini simameni, polepole kwa maringo njongeeni karamuni mpate kumwonja mwokozi Yesu

songs.title: Zaeni Matunda Mema
songs.lyrics:
ZAENI MATUNDA


Verse 1
Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni matunda yale
Zaeni yenye baraka, zaeni ya heri


Chorus
Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema;
Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.


Verse 2
Safisha mwenendo wako, safisha matendo yako;
Safisha na Bwana Yesu, safisha yote.


Chorus
Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema;
Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.


Verse 3
Fanyeni kazi kidugu, fanyeni kazi kwa bidii;
Fanyeni na Bwana Yesu; fanyeni yote.


Chorus
Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema;
Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.


Verse 4
Tolea matunda yako, pamoja na moyo wako;
Naye Bwana, Mungu wako, atakubariki.


Chorus
Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema;
Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.


Verse 5
Baraka za Mungu Baba, baraka za Mungu mwana;
Na za Roho Mtakatifu ziwe nanyi nyote.


Chorus
Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema;
Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.

songs.title: Zimetiririka Zimetiririka
songs.lyrics:
1. Zimetiririka zimetiririka,
Zimetiririka neema za Mungu

{ Zimetiririka, neema zimetiririka, neema zimetiririka
Wote tumeinuliwa aleluya } 

{ Majumbani mwetu (zimetiririka)
Mashambani mwetu (zimetiririka tiririka)
Familia zetu (zimetiririka) tumeinuliwa aleluya } *2

2. Tazama mimea inavyochanua,
Hizi ni neema kutoka Mbinguni

3. Tazama bahari na mawimbi yake
Vinashangilia neema za Mungu

4. Tazama wanyama wanavyopendeza
Ndege wa angani wanaburudisha

5. Mvua inanyesha jua inawaka
Kuukamilisha utukufu wake


6. Mchana na usiku vinatuongoza
Kuyafurahia majira ya mwaka

7. Mbingu zafurahi na mawingu yote
Vinashangilia neema za Mungu
